text: For great is his mercy to us, and his faith is unchanging for ever. Praise be to the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 1
text: O give praise to the Lord, for he is good: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 2
text: Let Israel now say, that his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 3
text: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 4
text: Let all worshippers of the Lord now say, that his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 5
text: I made my prayer to the Lord in my trouble: and the Lord gave me an answer, and put me in a wide place.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 6
text: The Lord is on my side; I will have no fear: what is man able to do to me?

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 7
text: The Lord is my great helper: I will see my desire against my haters.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 8
text: It is better to have faith in the Lord than to put one's hope in man.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 9
text: It is better to have faith in the Lord than to put one's hope in rulers.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 10
text: All the nations have come round me; but in the name of the Lord I will have them cut down.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 11
text: They are round me, yes, they are all about me; but in the name of the Lord I will have them cut down.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 12
text: They are round me like bees; but they are put out like a fire among thorns; for in the name of the Lord I will have them cut down.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 13
text: I have been hard pushed by you, so that I might have a fall: but the Lord was my helper.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 14
text: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 15
text: The sound of joy and salvation is in the tents of the upright; the right hand of the Lord does works of power.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 16
text: The right hand of the Lord is lifted up; the right hand of the Lord does works of power.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 17
text: Life and not death will be my part, and I will give out the story of the works of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 18
text: The hand of Jah has been hard on me; but he has not given me up to death.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 19
text: Let the doors of righteousness be open to me; I will go in and give praise to the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 20
text: This is the door of the Lord's house; the workers of righteousness will go in through it.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 21
text: I will give you praise, for you have given me an answer, and have become my salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 22
text: The stone which the builders put on one side has become the chief stone of the building.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 23
text: This is the Lord's doing; it is a wonder in our eyes.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 24
text: This is the day which the Lord has made; we will be full of joy and delight in it.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 25
text: Send salvation now, O Lord; Lord, send us your blessing.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 26
text: A blessing be on him who comes in the name of the Lord; we give you blessing from the house of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 27
text: The Lord is God, and he has given us light; let the holy dance be ordered with branches, even up to the horns of the altar.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 28
text: You are my God, and I will give you praise; my God, and I will give honour to your name.

title: Psalms Chapter 118 Verse 29
text: O give praise to the Lord, for he is good: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 1
text: - ALEPH - Happy are they who are without sin in their ways, walking in the law of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 2
text: Happy are they who keep his unchanging word, searching after him with all their heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 3
text: They do no evil; they go in his ways.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 4
text: You have put your orders into our hearts, so that we might keep them with care.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 5
text: If only my ways were ordered so that I might keep your rules!

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 6
text: Then I would not be put to shame, as long as I have respect for all your teaching.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 7
text: I will give you praise with an upright heart in learning your right decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 8
text: I will keep your rules: O give me not up completely.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 9
text: - BETH - How may a young man make his way clean? by guiding it after your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 10
text: I have made search for you with all my heart: O let me not go wandering far from your teaching.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 11
text: I have kept your sayings secretly in my heart, so that I might do no sin against you.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 12
text: Praise be to you, O Lord: give me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 13
text: With my lips have I made clear all the decisions of your mouth.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 14
text: I have taken as much delight in the way of your unchanging word, as in all wealth.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 15
text: I will give thought to your orders, and have respect for your ways.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 16
text: I will have delight in your rules; I will not let your word go out of my mind.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 17
text: - GIMEL - Give me, your servant, the reward of life, so that I may keep your word;

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 18
text: Let my eyes be open to see the wonders of your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 19
text: I am living in a strange land: do not let your teachings be kept secret from me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 20
text: My soul is broken with desire for your decisions at all times.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 21
text: Your hand has been against the men of pride, a curse is on those who go wandering out of your way.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 22
text: Take away from me shame and bitter words; for I have kept your unchanging word in my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 23
text: Rulers make evil designs against me; but your servant gives thought to your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 24
text: Your unchanging word is my delight, and the guide of my footsteps.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 25
text: - DALETH - My soul is joined to the dust: O give me life, in keeping with your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 26
text: I put the record of my ways before you, and you gave me an answer: O give me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 27
text: Make the way of your orders clear to me; then my thoughts will be ever on your wonders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 28
text: My soul is wasted with sorrow; give me strength again in keeping with your word

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 29
text: Take from me every false way; and in mercy give me your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 30
text: I have taken the way of faith: I have kept your decisions before me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 31
text: I have been true to your unchanging word; O Lord, do not put me to shame.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 32
text: I will go quickly in the way of your teaching, because you have given me a free heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 33
text: - HE - O Lord, let me see the way of your rules, and I will keep it to the end.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 34
text: Give me wisdom, so that I may keep your law; going after it with all my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 35
text: Make me go in the way of your teachings; for they are my delight.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 36
text: Let my heart be turned to your unchanging word, and not to evil desire.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 37
text: Let my eyes be turned away from what is false; give me life in your ways.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 38
text: Give effect to your word to your servant, in whose heart is the fear of you.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 39
text: Take away the shame which is my fear; for your decisions are good.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 40
text: See how great is my desire for your orders: give me life in your righteousness.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 41
text: - VAU - Let your mercies come to me, O Lord, even your salvation, as you have said.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 42
text: So that I may have an answer for the man who would put me to shame; for I have faith in your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 43
text: Take not your true word quite out of my mouth; for I have put my hope in your decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 44
text: So that I may keep your law for ever and ever;

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 45
text: So that my way may be in a wide place: because my search has been for your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 46
text: So that I may give knowledge of your unchanging word before kings, and not be put to shame.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 47
text: And so that I may take delight in your teachings, to which I have given my love.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 48
text: And so that my hands may be stretched out to you; and I will give thought to your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 49
text: - ZAIN - Keep in mind your word to your servant, for on it has my hope been fixed.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 50
text: This is my comfort in my trouble; that your sayings have given me life.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 51
text: The men of pride have made great sport of me; but I have not been turned from your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 52
text: I have kept the memory of your decisions from times past, O Lord; and they have been my comfort.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 53
text: I am burning with wrath, because of the sinners who have given up your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 54
text: Your rules have been melodies to me, while I have been living in strange lands.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 55
text: I have given thought to your name in the night, O Lord, and have kept your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 56
text: This has been true of me, that I have kept your orders in my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 57
text: - CHETH - The Lord is my heritage: I have said that I would be ruled by your words.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 58
text: I have given my mind to do your pleasure with all my heart; have mercy on me, as you have said.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 59
text: I gave thought to my steps, and my feet were turned into the way of your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 60
text: I was quick to do your orders, and let no time be wasted.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 61
text: The cords of evil-doers are round me; but I have kept in mind your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 62
text: In the middle of the night I will get up to give you praise, because of all your right decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 63
text: I keep company with all your worshippers, and those who have your orders in their memory.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 64
text: The earth, O Lord, is full of your mercy: give me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 65
text: - TETH - You have done good to your servant, O Lord, in keeping with your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 66
text: Give me knowledge and good sense; for I have put my faith in your teachings.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 67
text: Before I was in trouble I went out of the way; but now I keep your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 68
text: You are good, and your works are good; give me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 69
text: The men of pride have said false things about me; but I will keep your orders in my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 70
text: Their hearts are shut up with fat; but my delight is in your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 71
text: It is good for me to have been through trouble; so that I might come to the knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 72
text: The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of gold and silver.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 73
text: - JOD - Your hands have made me, and given me form: give me wisdom, so that I may have knowledge of your teaching.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 74
text: Your worshippers will see me and be glad; because my hope has been in your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 75
text: I have seen, O Lord, that your decisions are right, and that in unchanging faith you have sent trouble on me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 76
text: Let your mercy now be my comfort, as you have said to your servant.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 77
text: Let your gentle mercies come to me, so that I may have life; for your law is my delight.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 78
text: Let the men of pride be shamed; because they have falsely given decision against me; but I will give thought to your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 79
text: Let your worshippers be turned to me, and those who have knowledge of your words.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 80
text: Let all my heart be given to your orders, so that I may not be put to shame.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 81
text: - CAPH - My soul is wasted with desire for your salvation: but I have hope in your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 82
text: My eyes are full of weariness with searching for your word, saying, When will you give me comfort?

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 83
text: For I have become like a wine-skin black with smoke; but I still keep the memory of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 84
text: How short is the life of your servant! when will you give your decision against those who are attacking me?

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 85
text: The men of pride, who are turned away from your law, have put nets for me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 86
text: All your teachings are certain; they go after me with evil design; give me your help.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 87
text: They had almost put an end to me on earth; but I did not give up your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 88
text: Give me life in your mercy; so that I may be ruled by the unchanging word of your mouth.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 89
text: - LAMED - For ever, O Lord, your word is fixed in heaven.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 90
text: Your faith is unchanging from generation to generation: you have put the earth in its place, and it is not moved.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 91
text: They are ruled this day by your decisions; for all things are your servants.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 92
text: If your law had not been my delight, my troubles would have put an end to me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 93
text: I will ever keep your orders in mind; for in them I have life.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 94
text: I am yours, O be my saviour; for my desire has been for your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 95
text: The sinners have been waiting for me to give me up to destruction; but I will give all my mind to your unchanging ward.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 96
text: I have seen that nothing on earth is complete; but your teaching is very wide.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 97
text: - MEM - O what love I have for your law! I give thought to it all the day.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 98
text: Your teaching has made me wiser than my haters: for it is mine for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 99
text: I have more knowledge than all my teachers, because I give thought to your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 100
text: I have more wisdom than the old, because I have kept your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 101
text: I have kept back my feet from all evil ways, so that I might be true to your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 102
text: My heart has not been turned away from your decisions; for you have been my teacher.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 103
text: How sweet are your sayings to my taste! truly, they are sweeter than honey in my mouth!

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 104
text: Through your orders I get wisdom; for this reason I am a hater of every false way.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 105
text: - NUN - Your word is a light for my feet, ever shining on my way.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 106
text: I have made an oath and kept it, to be guided by your upright decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 107
text: I am greatly troubled, O Lord, give me life in keeping with your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 108
text: Take, O Lord, the free offerings of my mouth, and give me knowledge of your decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 109
text: My soul is ever in danger; but I still keep the memory of your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 110
text: Sinners have put a net to take me; but I was true to your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 111
text: I have taken your unchanging word as an eternal heritage; for it is the joy of my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 112
text: My heart is ever ready to keep your rules, even to the end.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 113
text: - SAMECH - I am a hater of men of doubting mind; but I am a lover of your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 114
text: You are my secret place and my breastplate against danger; my hope is in your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 115
text: Go far from me, you evil-doers; so that I may keep the teachings of my God.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 116
text: Be my support as you have said, and give me life; let not my hope be turned to shame.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 117
text: Let me not be moved, and I will be safe, and ever take delight in your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 118
text: You have overcome all those who are wandering from your rules; for all their thoughts are false.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 119
text: All the sinners of the earth are like waste metal in your eyes; and for this cause I give my love to your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 120
text: My flesh is moved for fear of you; I give honour to your decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 121
text: - AIN - I have done what is good and right: you will not give me into the hands of those who are working against me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 122
text: Take your servant's interests into your keeping; let me not be crushed by the men of pride.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 123
text: My eyes are wasted with desire for your salvation, and for the word of your righteousness.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 124
text: Be good to your servant in your mercy, and give me teaching in your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 125
text: I am your servant; give me wisdom, so that I may have knowledge of your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 126
text: It is time, O Lord, for you to let your work be seen; for they have made your law without effect.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 127
text: For this reason I have greater love far your teachings than for gold, even for shining gold.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 128
text: Because of it I keep straight in all things by your orders; and I am a hater of every false way.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 129
text: - PE - Your unchanging word is full of wonder; for this reason my soul keeps it.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 130
text: The opening of your words gives light; it gives good sense to the simple.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 131
text: My mouth was open wide, waiting with great desire for your teachings.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 132
text: Let your eyes be turned to me, and have mercy on me, as it is right for you to do to those who are lovers of your name.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 133
text: Let my steps be guided by your word; and let not sin have control over me.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 134
text: Make me free from the cruel rule of man; then I will keep your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 135
text: Let your servant see the shining of your face; give me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 136
text: Rivers of water are flowing from my eyes, because men do not keep your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 137
text: - TZADE - O Lord, great is your righteousness, and upright are your decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 138
text: You have given your unchanging word in righteousness, and it is for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 139
text: My passion has overcome me; because my haters are turned away from your words.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 140
text: Your word is of tested value; and it is dear to your servant.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 141
text: I am small and of no account; but I keep your orders in mind.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 142
text: Your righteousness is an unchanging righteousness, and your law is certain.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 143
text: Pain and trouble have overcome me: but your teachings are my delight.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 144
text: The righteousness of your unchanging word is eternal; give me wisdom so that I may have life.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 145
text: - KOPH - I have made my prayer with all my heart; give answer to me, O Lord: I will keep your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 146
text: My cry has gone up to you; take me out of trouble, and I will be guided by your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 147
text: Before the sun is up, my cry for help comes to your ear; my hope is in your words.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 148
text: In the night watches I am awake, so that I may give thought to your saying.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 149
text: Let my voice come to you, in your mercy; O Lord, by your decisions give me life.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 150
text: Those who have evil designs against me come near; they are far from your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 151
text: You are near, O Lord; and all your teachings are true.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 152
text: I have long had knowledge that your unchanging word is for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 153
text: - RESH - O see my trouble, and be my saviour; for I keep your law in my mind,

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 154
text: Undertake my cause, and come to my help, give me life, as you have said.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 155
text: Salvation is far from evil-doers; for they have made no search for your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 156
text: Great is the number of your mercies, O Lord; give me life in keeping with your decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 157
text: Great is the number of those who are against me; but I have not been turned away from your unchanging word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 158
text: I saw with hate those who were untrue to you; for they did not keep your saying.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 159
text: See how great is my love for your orders: give me life, O Lord, in keeping with your mercy.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 160
text: Your word is true from the first; and your upright decision is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 161
text: - SHIN - Rulers have been cruel to me without cause; but I have the fear of your word in my heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 162
text: I am delighted by your saying, like a man who makes discovery of great wealth.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 163
text: I am full of hate and disgust for false words; but I am a lover of your law.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 164
text: Seven times a day do I give you praise, because of your upright decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 165
text: Great peace have lovers of your law; they have no cause for falling.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 166
text: Lord, my hope has been in your salvation; and I have kept your teachings.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 167
text: My soul has kept your unchanging word; great is my love for it.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 168
text: I have been ruled by your orders; for all my ways are before you.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 169
text: - TAU - Let my cry come before you, O Lord; give me wisdom in keeping with your word.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 170
text: Let my prayer come before you; take me out of trouble, as you have said.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 171
text: Let my lips be flowing with praise, because you have given me knowledge of your rules.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 172
text: Let my tongue make songs in praise of your word; for all your teachings are righteousness.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 173
text: Let your hand be near for my help; for I have given my heart to your orders.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 174
text: All my desire has been for your salvation, O Lord; and your law is my delight.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 175
text: Give life to my soul so that it may give you praise; and let your decisions be my support.

title: Psalms Chapter 119 Verse 176
text: I have gone out of the way like a wandering sheep; make search for your servant; for I keep your teachings ever in mind.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - In my trouble my cry went up to the Lord, and he gave me an answer.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 2
text: O Lord, be the saviour of my soul from false lips, and from the tongue of deceit.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 3
text: What punishment will he give you? what more will he do to you, you false tongue?

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 4
text: Sharp arrows of the strong, and burning fire.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 5
text: Sorrow is mine because I am strange in Meshech, and living in the tents of Kedar.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 6
text: My soul has long been living with the haters of peace.

title: Psalms Chapter 120 Verse 7
text: I am for peace: but when I say so, they are for war.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - My eyes are lifted up to the hills: O where will my help come from?

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 2
text: Your help comes from the Lord, who made heaven and earth.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 3
text: May he not let your foot be moved: no need of sleep has he who keeps you.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 4
text: See, the eyes of Israel's keeper will not be shut in sleep.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 5
text: The Lord is your keeper; the Lord is your shade on your right hand.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 6
text: You will not be touched by the sun in the day, or by the moon at night.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 7
text: The Lord will keep you safe from all evil; he will take care of your soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 121 Verse 8
text: The Lord will keep watch over your going out and your coming in, from this time and for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. Of David. - I was glad because they said to me, We will go into the house of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 2
text: At last our feet were inside your doors, O Jerusalem.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 3
text: O Jerusalem, you are like a town which is well joined together;

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 4
text: To which the tribes went up, even the tribes of the Lord, for a witness to Israel, to give praise to the name of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 5
text: For there seats for the judges were placed, even the rulers' seats of the line of David.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 6
text: O make prayers for the peace of Jerusalem; may they whose love is given to you do well.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 7
text: May peace be inside your walls, and wealth in your noble houses.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 8
text: Because of my brothers and friends, I will now say, Let peace be with you.

title: Psalms Chapter 122 Verse 9
text: Because of the house of the Lord our God, I will be working for your good.

title: Psalms Chapter 123 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - To you my eyes are lifted up, even to you whose seat is in the heavens.

title: Psalms Chapter 123 Verse 2
text: See! as the eyes of servants are turned to the hands of their masters, and the eyes of a servant-girl to her owner, so our eyes are waiting for the Lord our God, till he has mercy on us.

title: Psalms Chapter 123 Verse 3
text: Have mercy on us, O Lord, have mercy on us: for all men are looking down on us.

title: Psalms Chapter 123 Verse 4
text: For long enough have men of pride made sport of our soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. Of David. - If it had not been the Lord who was on our side (let Israel now say);

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 2
text: If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, when men came up against us;

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 3
text: They would have made a meal of us while still living, in the heat of their wrath against us:

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 4
text: We would have been covered by the waters; the streams would have gone over our soul;

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 5
text: Yes, the waters of pride would have gone over our soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 6
text: Praise be to the Lord, who has not let us be wounded by their teeth.

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 7
text: Our soul has gone free like a bird out of the net of those who would take her: the net is broken, and we are free.

title: Psalms Chapter 124 Verse 8
text: Our help is in the name of the Lord, the maker of heaven and earth.

title: Psalms Chapter 125 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Those whose hope is in the Lord are like the mountain of Zion, which may not be moved, but keeps its place for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 125 Verse 2
text: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord is round about his people, from this time and for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 125 Verse 3
text: For the rod of sinners will not be resting on the heritage of the upright; so that the upright may not put out their hands to evil.

title: Psalms Chapter 125 Verse 4
text: Do good, O Lord, to those who are good, and to those who are upright in heart.

title: Psalms Chapter 125 Verse 5
text: But as for such as are turned out of the straight way, the Lord will take them away with the workers of evil. Let peace be on Israel.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - When the Lord made a change in Zion's fate, we were like men in a dream.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 2
text: Then our mouths were full of laughing, and our tongues gave a glad cry; they said among the nations, The Lord has done great things for them.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 3
text: The Lord has done great things for us; because of which we are glad.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 4
text: Let our fate be changed, O Lord, like the streams in the South.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 5
text: Those who put in seed with weeping will get in the grain with cries of joy.

title: Psalms Chapter 126 Verse 6
text: Though a man may go out weeping, taking his vessel of seed with him; he will come again in joy, with the corded stems of grain in his arms.

title: Psalms Chapter 127 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. Of Solomon. - If the Lord is not helping the builders, then the building of a house is to no purpose: if the Lord does not keep the town, the watchman keeps his watch for nothing.

title: Psalms Chapter 127 Verse 2
text: It is of no use for you to get up early, and to go late to your rest, with the bread of sorrow for your food; for the Lord gives to his loved ones in sleep.

title: Psalms Chapter 127 Verse 3
text: See, sons are a heritage from the Lord; the fruit of the body is his reward.

title: Psalms Chapter 127 Verse 4
text: Like arrows in the hand of a man of war, are the children of the young.

title: Psalms Chapter 127 Verse 5
text: Happy is the man who has a good store of them; he will not be put to shame, but his cause will be supported by them against his haters.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Happy is the worshipper of the Lord, who is walking in his ways.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 2
text: You will have the fruit of the work of your hands: happy will you be, and all will be well for you.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 3
text: Your wife will be like a fertile vine in the inmost parts of your house: your children will be like olive plants round your table.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 4
text: See! this is the blessing of the worshipper of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 5
text: May the Lord send you blessing out of Zion: may you see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life.

title: Psalms Chapter 128 Verse 6
text: May you see your children's children. Peace be on Israel.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Great have been my troubles from the time when I was young (let Israel now say);

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 2
text: Great have been my troubles from the time when I was young, but my troubles have not overcome me.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 3
text: The ploughmen were ploughing on my back; long were the wounds they made.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 4
text: The Lord is true: the cords of the evil-doers are broken in two.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 5
text: Let all the haters of Zion be shamed and turned back.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 6
text: Let them be like the grass on the house-tops, which is dry before it comes to full growth.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 7
text: He who gets in the grain has no use for it; and they do not make bands of it for the grain-stems.

title: Psalms Chapter 129 Verse 8
text: And those who go by do not say, The blessing of the Lord be on you; we give you blessing in the name of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Out of the deep have I sent up my cry to you, O Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 2
text: Lord, let my voice come before you: let your ears be awake to the voice of my prayer.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 3
text: O Jah, if you took note of every sin, who would go free?

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 4
text: But there is forgiveness with you, so that you may be feared.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 5
text: I am waiting for the Lord, my soul is waiting for him, and my hope is in his word.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 6
text: My soul is watching for the Lord more than those who are watching for the morning; yes, more than the watchers for the morning.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 7
text: O Israel, have hope in the Lord; for with the Lord is mercy and full salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 130 Verse 8
text: And he will make Israel free from all his sins.

title: Psalms Chapter 131 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. Of David. - Lord, there is no pride in my heart and my eyes are not lifted up; and I have not taken part in great undertakings, or in things over-hard for me.

title: Psalms Chapter 131 Verse 2
text: See, I have made my soul calm and quiet, like a child on its mother's breast; my soul is like a child on its mother's breast.

title: Psalms Chapter 131 Verse 3
text: O Israel, have hope in the Lord, from this time and for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Lord, give thought to David, and to all his troubles;

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 2
text: How he made an oath to the Lord, and gave his word to the great God of Jacob, saying,

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 3
text: Truly, I will not come into my house, or go to my bed,

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 4
text: I will not give sleep to my eyes, or rest to my eyeballs,

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 5
text: Till I have got a place for the Lord, a resting-place for the great God of Jacob.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 6
text: We had news of it at Ephrathah: we came to it in the fields of the wood.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 7
text: Let us go into his tent; let us give worship at his feet.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 8
text: Come back, O Lord, to your resting-place; you and the ark of your strength.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 9
text: Let your priests be clothed with righteousness; and let your saints give cries of joy.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 10
text: Because of your servant David, do not give up your king.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 11
text: The Lord gave a true oath to David, which he will not take back, saying, I will give your kingdom to the fruit of your body.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 12
text: If your children keep my word, and the teachings which I will give them, their children will be rulers of your kingdom for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 13
text: For the Lord's heart is on Zion, desiring it for his resting-place.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 14
text: This is my rest for ever: here will I ever be; for this is my desire.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 15
text: My blessing will be on her food; and her poor will be full of bread.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 16
text: Her priests will be clothed with salvation; and her saints will give cries of joy.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 17
text: There I will make the horn of David fertile: I have made ready a light for my king.

title: Psalms Chapter 132 Verse 18
text: His haters will be clothed with shame; but I will make his crown shining.

title: Psalms Chapter 133 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. Of David. - See how good and how pleasing it is for brothers to be living together in harmony!

title: Psalms Chapter 133 Verse 2
text: It is like oil of great price on the head, flowing down over the face, even Aaron's face: coming down to the edge of his robe;

title: Psalms Chapter 133 Verse 3
text: Like the dew of Hermon, which comes down on the mountains of Zion: for there the Lord gave orders for the blessing, even life for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 134 Verse 1
text: - A Song of the going up. - Give praise to the Lord, all you servants of the Lord, who take your places in the house of the Lord by night.

title: Psalms Chapter 134 Verse 2
text: Give praise to the Lord, lifting up your hands in his holy place.

title: Psalms Chapter 134 Verse 3
text: May the Lord, who made heaven and earth, send you blessing out of Zion,

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 1
text: Let the Lord be praised. O you servants of the Lord, give praise to the name of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 2
text: You who are in the house of the Lord, and in the open spaces of the house of our God,

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 3
text: Give praise to Jah, for he is good: make melody to his name, for it is pleasing.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 4
text: For the Lord has taken Jacob for himself, and Israel for his property.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 5
text: I know that the Lord is great, and that our Lord is greater than all other gods.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 6
text: The Lord has done whatever was pleasing to him, in heaven, and on the earth, in the seas and in all the deep waters.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 7
text: He makes the mists go up from the ends of the earth; he makes thunder-flames for the rain; he sends out the winds from his store-houses.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 8
text: He put to death the first-fruits of Egypt, of man and of beast.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 9
text: He sent signs and wonders among you, O Egypt, on Pharaoh, and on all his servants.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 10
text: He overcame great nations, and put strong kings to death;

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 11
text: Sihon, king of the Amorites, and Og, king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan;

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 12
text: And gave their land for a heritage, even for a heritage to Israel his people.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 13
text: O Lord, your name is eternal; and the memory of you will have no end.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 14
text: For the Lord will be judge of his people's cause; his feelings will be changed to his servants.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 15
text: The images of the nations are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 16
text: They have mouths, but no voice, they have eyes, but they do not see;

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 17
text: They have ears, but no hearing; and there is no breath in their mouths.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 18
text: Those who make them are like them; and so is everyone who puts his hope in them.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 19
text: Give praise to the Lord, O children of Israel: give praise to the Lord, O sons of Aaron:

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 20
text: Give praise to the Lord, O sons of Levi: let all the worshippers of the Lord give him praise.

title: Psalms Chapter 135 Verse 21
text: Praise be to the Lord out of Zion, even to the Lord whose house is in Jerusalem, Let the Lord be praised.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 1
text: O give praise to the Lord, for he is good: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 2
text: O give praise to the God of gods: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 3
text: O give praise to the Lord of lords: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 4
text: To him who only does great wonders: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 5
text: To him who by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 6
text: To him by whom the earth was stretched out over the waters: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 7
text: To him who made great lights: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 8
text: The sun to have rule by day: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 9
text: The moon and the stars to have rule by night: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 10
text: To him who put to death the first-fruits of Egypt: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 11
text: And took out Israel from among them: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 12
text: With a strong hand and an outstretched arm: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 13
text: To him who made a way through the Red Sea: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 14
text: And let Israel go through it: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 15
text: By him Pharaoh and his army were overturned in the Red Sea: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 16
text: To him who took his people through the waste land: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 17
text: To him who overcame great kings: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 18
text: And put noble kings to death: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 19
text: Sihon, king of the Amorites: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 20
text: And Og, king of Bashan: for his mercy is unchanging for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 21
text: And gave their land to his people for a heritage: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 22
text: Even a heritage for his servant Israel: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 23
text: Who kept us in mind when we were in trouble: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 24
text: And has taken us out of the hands of our haters: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 25
text: Who gives food to all flesh: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 136 Verse 26
text: O give praise to the God of heaven: for his mercy is unchanging for ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 1
text: By the rivers of Babylon we were seated, weeping at the memory of Zion,

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 2
text: Hanging our instruments of music on the trees by the waterside.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 3
text: For there those who had taken us prisoners made request for a song; and those who had taken away all we had gave us orders to be glad, saying, Give us one of the songs of Zion.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 4
text: How may we give the Lord's song in a strange land?

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 5
text: If I keep not your memory, O Jerusalem, let not my right hand keep the memory of its art.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 6
text: If I let you go out of my thoughts, and if I do not put Jerusalem before my greatest joy, let my tongue be fixed to the roof of my mouth.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 7
text: O Lord, keep in mind against the children of Edom the day of Jerusalem; how they said, Let it be uncovered, uncovered even to its base.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 8
text: O daughter of Babylon, whose fate is destruction; happy is the man who does to you what you have done to us.

title: Psalms Chapter 137 Verse 9
text: Happy is the man who takes your little ones, crushing them against the rocks.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 1
text: - Of David. - I will give you praise with all my heart: I will make melody to you before the gods.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 2
text: I will give worship before your holy Temple, praising your name for your mercy and for your unchanging faith: for you have made your word greater than all your name.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 3
text: When my cry came to your ears you gave me an answer, and made me great with strength in my soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 4
text: All the kings of the earth will give you praise, O Lord, when the words of your mouth come to their ears.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 5
text: They will make songs about the ways of the Lord; for great is the glory of the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 6
text: Though the Lord is high, he sees those who are low; and he has knowledge from far off of those who are lifted up.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 7
text: Even when trouble is round me, you will give me life; your hand will be stretched out against the wrath of my haters, and your right hand will be my salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 138 Verse 8
text: The Lord will make all things complete for me: O Lord, your mercy is eternal; do not give up the works of your hands.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 1
text: - To the chief music-maker. A Psalm. Of David. - O Lord, you have knowledge of me, searching out all my secrets.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 2
text: You have knowledge when I am seated and when I get up, you see my thoughts from far away.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 3
text: You keep watch over my steps and my sleep, and have knowledge of all my ways.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 4
text: For there is not a word on my tongue which is not clear to you, O Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 5
text: I am shut in by you on every side, and you have put your hand on me.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 6
text: Such knowledge is a wonder greater than my powers; it is so high that I may not come near it.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 7
text: Where may I go from your spirit? how may I go in flight from you?

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 8
text: If I go up to heaven, you are there: or if I make my bed in the underworld, you are there.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 9
text: If I take the wings of the morning, and go to the farthest parts of the sea;

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 10
text: Even there will I be guided by your hand, and your right hand will keep me.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 11
text: If I say, Only let me be covered by the dark, and the light about me be night;

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 12
text: Even the dark is not dark to you; the night is as bright as the day: for dark and light are the same to you.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 13
text: My flesh was made by you, and my parts joined together in my mother's body.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 14
text: I will give you praise, for I am strangely and delicately formed; your works are great wonders, and of this my soul is fully conscious.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 15
text: My frame was not unseen by you when I was made secretly, and strangely formed in the lowest parts of the earth.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 16
text: Your eyes saw my unformed substance; in your book all my days were recorded, even those which were purposed before they had come into being.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 17
text: How dear are your thoughts to me, O God! how great is the number of them!

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 18
text: If I made up their number, it would be more than the grains of sand; when I am awake, I am still with you.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 19
text: If only you would put the sinners to death, O God; go far from me, you men of blood.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 20
text: For they go against you with evil designs, and your haters make sport of your name.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 21
text: Are not your haters hated by me, O Lord? are not those who are lifted up against you a cause of grief to me?

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 22
text: My hate for them is complete; my thoughts of them are as if they were making war on me.

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 23
text: O God, let the secrets of my heart be uncovered, and let my wandering thoughts be tested:

title: Psalms Chapter 139 Verse 24
text: See if there is any way of sorrow in me, and be my guide in the eternal way.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 1
text: - To the chief music-maker. A Psalm. Of David. - O Lord, take me out of the power of the evil man; keep me safe from the violent man:

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 2
text: For their hearts are full of evil designs; and they are ever making ready causes of war.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 3
text: Their tongues are sharp like the tongue of a snake; the poison of snakes is under their lips. (Selah.)

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 4
text: O Lord, take me out of the hands of sinners; keep me safe from the violent man: for they are designing my downfall.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 5
text: The men of pride have put secret cords for my feet; stretching nets in my way, so that they may take me with their tricks. (Selah.)

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 6
text: I have said to the Lord, You are my God: give ear, O Lord, to the voice of my prayer.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 7
text: O Lord God, the strength of my salvation, you have been a cover over my head in the day of the fight.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 8
text: O Lord, give not the wrongdoer his desire; give him no help in his evil designs, or he may be uplifted in pride. (Selah.)

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 9
text: As for those who come round me, let their heads be covered by the evil of their lips.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 10
text: Let burning flames come down on them: let them be put into the fire, and into deep waters, so that they may not get up again.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 11
text: Let not a man of evil tongue be safe on earth: let destruction overtake the violent man with blow on blow.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 12
text: I am certain that the Lord will take care of the cause of the poor, and of the rights of those who are troubled.

title: Psalms Chapter 140 Verse 13
text: Truly, the upright will give praise to your name: the holy will have a place in your house.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 1
text: - A Psalm. Of David. - Lord, I have made my cry to you; come to me quickly; give ear to my voice, when it goes up to you.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 2
text: Let my prayer be ordered before you like a sweet smell; and let the lifting up of my hands be like the evening offering.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 3
text: O Lord, keep a watch over my mouth; keep the door of my lips.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 4
text: Keep my heart from desiring any evil thing, or from taking part in the sins of the evil-doers with men who do wrong: and let me have no part in their good things.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 5
text: Let the upright give me punishment; and let the god-fearing man put me in the right way; but I will not let the oil of sinners come on my head: when they do evil I will give myself to prayer.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 6
text: When destruction comes to their judges by the side of the rock, they will give ear to my words, for they are sweet.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 7
text: Our bones are broken up at the mouth of the underworld, as the earth is broken by the plough.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 8
text: But my eyes are turned to you, O Lord God: my hope is in you; let not my soul be given up to death.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 9
text: Keep me from the net which they have put down for me, and from the designs of the workers of evil.

title: Psalms Chapter 141 Verse 10
text: Let the sinners be taken in the nets which they themselves have put down, while I go free.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 1
text: - Maschil. Of David. A prayer when he was in the hole of the rock. - The sound of my cry went up to the Lord; with my voice I made my prayer for grace to the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 2
text: I put all my sorrows before him; and made clear to him all my trouble.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 3
text: When my spirit is overcome, your eyes are on my goings; nets have been secretly placed in the way in which I go.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 4
text: Looking to my right side, I saw no man who was my friend: I had no safe place; no one had any care for my soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 5
text: I have made my cry to you, O Lord; I have said, You are my safe place, and my heritage in the land of the living.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 6
text: Give ear to my cry, for I am made very low: take me out of the hands of my haters, for they are stronger than I.

title: Psalms Chapter 142 Verse 7
text: Take my soul out of prison, so that I may give praise to your name: the upright will give praise because of me; for you have given me a full reward.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 1
text: - A Psalm. Of David. - Let my prayer come to you, O Lord; give ear to my requests for your grace; keep faith with me, and give me an answer in your righteousness;

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 2
text: Let not your servant come before you to be judged; for no man living is upright in your eyes.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 3
text: The evil man has gone after my soul; my life is crushed down to the earth: he has put me in the dark, like those who have long been dead.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 4
text: Because of this my spirit is overcome; and my heart is full of fear.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 5
text: I keep in mind the early days of the past, giving thought to all your acts, even to the work of your hands.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 6
text: My hands are stretched out to you: my soul is turned to you, like a land in need of water. (Selah.)

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 7
text: Be quick in answering me, O Lord, for the strength of my spirit is gone: let me see your face, so that I may not be like those who go down into the underworld.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 8
text: Let the story of your mercy come to me in the morning, for my hope is in you: give me knowledge of the way in which I am to go; for my soul is lifted up to you.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 9
text: O Lord, take me out of the hands of my haters; my soul is waiting for you.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 10
text: Give me teaching so that I may do your pleasure; for you are my God: let your good Spirit be my guide into the land of righteousness.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 11
text: Give me life, O Lord, because of your name; in your righteousness take my soul out of trouble.

title: Psalms Chapter 143 Verse 12
text: And in your mercy put an end to my haters, and send destruction on all those who are against my soul; for I am your servant.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 1
text: - A Psalm. Of David. - Praise be to the God of my strength, teaching my hands the use of the sword, and my fingers the art of fighting:

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 2
text: He is my strength, and my Rock; my high tower, and my saviour; my keeper and my hope: he gives me authority over my people.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 3
text: Lord, what is man, that you keep him in mind? or the son of man that you take him into account?

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 4
text: Man is like a breath: his life is like a shade which is quickly gone.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 5
text: Come down, O Lord, from your heavens: at your touch let the mountains give out smoke.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 6
text: With your storm-flames send them in flight: send out your arrows for their destruction.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 7
text: Put out your hand from on high; make me free, take me safely out of the great waters, and out of the hands of strange men;

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 8
text: In whose mouths are false words, and whose right hand is a right hand of deceit.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 9
text: I will make a new song to you, O God; I will make melody to you on an instrument of ten cords.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 10
text: It is God who gives salvation to kings; and who kept his servant David from the wounding sword.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 11
text: Make me free, and take me out of the hands of strange men, in whose mouths are false words, and whose right hand is a right hand of deceit.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 12
text: Our sons are like tall young plants; and our daughters like the shining stones of a king's house;

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 13
text: Our store-houses are full of all good things; and our sheep give birth to thousands and ten thousands in our fields.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 14
text: Our oxen are well weighted down; our cows give birth safely; there is no going out, and there is no cry of sorrow in our open places.

title: Psalms Chapter 144 Verse 15
text: Happy is the nation whose ways are so ordered: yes, happy is the nation whose God is the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 1
text: - A Song of praise. Of David. - Let me give glory to you, O God, my King; and blessing to your name for ever and ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 2
text: Every day will I give you blessing, praising your name for ever and ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 3
text: Great is the Lord, and greatly to be praised; his power may never be searched out.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 4
text: One generation after another will give praise to your great acts, and make clear the operation of your strength.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 5
text: My thoughts will be of the honour and glory of your rule, and of the wonder of your works.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 6
text: Men will be talking of the power and fear of your acts; I will give word of your glory.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 7
text: Their sayings will be full of the memory of all your mercy, and they will make songs of your righteousness.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 8
text: The Lord is full of grace and pity; not quickly angry, but great in mercy.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 9
text: The Lord is good to all men; and his mercies are over all his works.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 10
text: All the works of your hands give praise to you, O Lord; and your saints give you blessing.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 11
text: Their words will be of the glory of your kingdom, and their talk of your strength;

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 12
text: So that the sons of men may have knowledge of his acts of power, and of the great glory of his kingdom.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 13
text: Your kingdom is an eternal kingdom, and your rule is through all generations.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 14
text: The Lord is the support of all who are crushed, and the lifter up of all who are bent down.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 15
text: The eyes of all men are waiting for you; and you give them their food in its time.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 16
text: By the opening of your hand, every living thing has its desire in full measure.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 17
text: The Lord is upright in all his ways, and kind in all his works.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 18
text: The Lord is near all those who give honour to his name; even to all who give honour to him with true hearts.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 19
text: To his worshippers, he will give their desire; their cry comes to his ears, and he gives them salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 20
text: The Lord will keep all his worshippers from danger; but he will send destruction on all sinners.

title: Psalms Chapter 145 Verse 21
text: My mouth will give praise to the Lord; let all flesh be blessing his holy name for ever and ever.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 1
text: Let the Lord be praised. Give praise to the Lord, O my soul.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 2
text: While I have breath I will give praise to the Lord: I will make melody to my God while I have my being.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 3
text: Put not your faith in rulers, or in the son of man, in whom there is no salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 4
text: Man's breath goes out, he is turned back again to dust; in that day all his purposes come to an end.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 5
text: Happy is the man who has the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 6
text: Who made heaven and earth, the sea, and all things in them; who keeps faith for ever:

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 7
text: Who gives their rights to those who are crushed down; and gives food to those who are in need of it: the Lord makes the prisoners free;

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 8
text: The Lord makes open the eyes of the blind; the Lord is the lifter up of those who are bent down; the Lord is a lover of the upright;

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 9
text: The Lord takes care of those who are in a strange land; he gives help to the widow and to the child who has no father; but he sends destruction on the way of sinners.

title: Psalms Chapter 146 Verse 10
text: The Lord will be King for ever; your God, O Zion, will be King through all generations. Praise be to the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 1
text: Give praise to the Lord; for it is good to make melody to our God; praise is pleasing and beautiful.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 2
text: The Lord is building up Jerusalem; he makes all the outlaws of Israel come together.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 3
text: He makes the broken-hearted well, and puts oil on their wounds.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 4
text: He sees the number of the stars; he gives them all their names.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 5
text: Great is our Lord, and great his power; there is no limit to his wisdom.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 6
text: The Lord gives help to the poor in spirit; but he sends sinners down in shame.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 7
text: Make songs of praise to the Lord; make melody to our God with instruments of music.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 8
text: By his hand the heaven is covered with clouds and rain is stored up for the earth; he makes the grass tall on the mountains.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 9
text: He gives food to every beast, and to the young ravens in answer to their cry.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 10
text: He has no delight in the strength of a horse; he takes no pleasure in the legs of a man.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 11
text: The Lord takes pleasure in his worshippers, and in those whose hope is in his mercy.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 12
text: Give praise to the Lord, O Jerusalem; give praise to your God, O Zion.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 13
text: He has made strong the iron bands of your doors; he has sent blessings on your children inside your walls.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 14
text: He gives peace in all your land, making your stores full of fat grain.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 15
text: He sends out his orders to the earth; his word goes out quickly.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 16
text: He gives snow like wool; he sends out ice-drops like dust.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 17
text: He sends down ice like raindrops: water is made hard by his cold.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 18
text: At the outgoing of his word, the ice is turned to water; when he sends out his wind, there is a flowing of waters.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 19
text: He makes his word clear to Jacob, teaching Israel his laws and his decisions.

title: Psalms Chapter 147 Verse 20
text: He has not done these things for any other nation: and as for his laws, they have no knowledge of them. Let the Lord be praised.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 1
text: Give praise to the Lord. Let the Lord be praised from the heavens: give him praise in the skies.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 2
text: Give praise to him, all you his angels: give praise to him, all his armies.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 3
text: Give praise to him, you sun and moon: give praise to him, all you stars of light.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 4
text: Give praise to him, you highest heavens, and you waters which are over the heavens.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 5
text: Let them give praise to the name of the Lord: for he gave the order, and they were made.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 6
text: He has put them in their places for ever; he has given them their limits which may not be broken.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 7
text: Give praise to the Lord from the earth, you great sea-beasts, and deep places:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 8
text: Fire and rain of ice, snow and mists; storm-wind, doing his word:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 9
text: Mountains and all hills; fruit-trees and all trees of the mountains:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 10
text: Beasts and all cattle; insects and winged birds:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 11
text: Kings of the earth, and all peoples; rulers and all judges of the earth:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 12
text: Young men and virgins; old men and children:

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 13
text: Let them give glory to the name of the Lord: for his name only is to be praised: his kingdom is over the earth and the heaven.

title: Psalms Chapter 148 Verse 14
text: He has put on high the horn of his people, for the praise of all his saints; even the children of Israel, a people which is near to him. Let the Lord be praised.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 1
text: Let the Lord be praised. Make a new song to the Lord, let his praise be in the meeting of his saints.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 2
text: Let Israel have joy in his maker; let the children of Zion be glad in their King.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 3
text: Let them give praise to his name in the dance: let them make melody to him with instruments of brass and corded instruments of music.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 4
text: For the Lord has pleasure in his people: he gives the poor in spirit a crown of salvation.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 5
text: Let the saints have joy and glory: let them give cries of joy on their beds.

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 6
text: Let the high praises of God be in their mouths, and a two-edged sword in their hands;

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 7
text: To give the nations the reward of their sins, and the peoples their punishment;

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 8
text: To put their kings in chains, and their rulers in bands of iron;

title: Psalms Chapter 149 Verse 9
text: To give them the punishment which is in the holy writings: this honour is given to all his saints. Praise be to the Lord.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 1
text: Let the Lord be praised. Give praise to God in his holy place: give him praise in the heaven of his power.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 2
text: Give him praise for his acts of power: give him praise in the measure of his great strength.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 3
text: Give him praise with the sound of the horn: give him praise with corded instruments of music.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 4
text: Give him praise with instruments of brass and in the dance: give him praise with horns and corded instruments.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 5
text: Give him praise with the loud brass: give him praise with the high-sounding brass.

title: Psalms Chapter 150 Verse 6
text: Let everything which has breath give praise to the Lord. Let the Lord be praised.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 1
text: The wise sayings of Solomon, the son of David, king of Israel.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 2
text: To have knowledge of wise teaching; to be clear about the words of reason:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 3
text: To be trained in the ways of wisdom, in righteousness and judging truly and straight behaviour:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 4
text: To make the simple-minded sharp, and to give the young man knowledge, and serious purpose:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 5
text: (The wise man, hearing, will get greater learning, and the acts of the man of good sense will be wisely guided:)

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 6
text: To get the sense of wise sayings and secrets, and of the words of the wise and their dark sayings.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 7
text: The fear of the Lord is the start of knowledge: but the foolish have no use for wisdom and teaching.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 8
text: My son, give ear to the training of your father, and do not give up the teaching of your mother:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 9
text: For they will be a crown of grace for your head, and chain-ornaments about your neck.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 10
text: My son, if sinners would take you out of the right way, do not go with them.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 11
text: If they say, Come with us; let us make designs against the good, waiting secretly for the upright, without cause;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 12
text: Let us overcome them living, like the underworld, and in their strength, as those who go down to death;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 13
text: Goods of great price will be ours, our houses will be full of wealth;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 14
text: Take your chance with us, and we will all have one money-bag:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 15
text: My son, do not go with them; keep your feet from their ways:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 16
text: For their feet are running after evil, and they are quick to take a man's life.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 17
text: Truly, to no purpose is the net stretched out before the eyes of the bird:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 18
text: And they are secretly waiting for their blood and making ready destruction for themselves.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 19
text: Such is the fate of everyone who goes in search of profit; it takes away the life of its owners.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 20
text: Wisdom is crying out in the street; her voice is loud in the open places;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 21
text: Her words are sounding in the meeting-places, and in the doorways of the town:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 22
text: How long, you simple ones, will foolish things be dear to you? and pride a delight to the haters of authority? how long will the foolish go on hating knowledge?

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 23
text: Be turned again by my sharp words: see, I will send the flow of my spirit on you, and make my words clear to you.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 24
text: Because your ears were shut to my voice; no one gave attention to my out-stretched hand;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 25
text: You were not controlled by my guiding, and would have nothing to do with my sharp words:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 26
text: So in the day of your trouble I will be laughing; I will make sport of your fear;

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 27
text: When your fear comes on you like a storm, and your trouble like a rushing wind; when pain and sorrow come on you.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 28
text: Then I will give no answer to their cries; searching for me early, they will not see me:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 29
text: For they were haters of knowledge, and did not give their hearts to the fear of the Lord:

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 30
text: They had no desire for my teaching, and my words of protest were as nothing to them.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 31
text: So the fruit of their way will be their food, and with the designs of their hearts they will be made full.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 32
text: For the turning back of the simple from teaching will be the cause of their death, and the peace of the foolish will be their destruction.

title: Proverbs Chapter 1 Verse 33
text: But whoever gives ear to me will take his rest safely, living in peace without fear of evil.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 1
text: My son, if you will take my words to your heart, storing up my laws in your mind;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 2
text: So that your ear gives attention to wisdom, and your heart is turned to knowledge;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 3
text: Truly, if you are crying out for good sense, and your request is for knowledge;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 4
text: If you are looking for her as for silver, and searching for her as for stored-up wealth;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 5
text: Then the fear of the Lord will be clear to you, and knowledge of God will be yours.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 6
text: For the Lord gives wisdom; out of his mouth come knowledge and reason:

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 7
text: He has salvation stored up for the upright, he is a breastplate to those in whom there is no evil;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 8
text: He keeps watch on the ways which are right, and takes care of those who have the fear of him.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 9
text: Then you will have knowledge of righteousness and right acting, and upright behaviour, even of every good way.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 10
text: For wisdom will come into your heart, and knowledge will be pleasing to your soul;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 11
text: Wise purposes will be watching over you, and knowledge will keep you;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 12
text: Giving you salvation from the evil man, from those whose words are false;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 13
text: Who give up the way of righteousness, to go by dark roads;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 14
text: Who take pleasure in wrongdoing, and have joy in the evil designs of the sinner;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 15
text: Whose ways are not straight, and whose footsteps are turned to evil:

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 16
text: To take you out of the power of the strange woman, who says smooth words with her tongue;

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 17
text: Who is false to the husband of her early years, and does not keep the agreement of her God in mind:

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 18
text: For her house is on the way down to death; her footsteps go down to the shades:

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 19
text: Those who go to her do not come back again; their feet do not keep in the ways of life:

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 20
text: So that you may go in the way of good men, and keep in the footsteps of the upright.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 21
text: For the upright will be living in the land, and the good will have it for their heritage.

title: Proverbs Chapter 2 Verse 22
text: But sinners will be cut off from the land, and those whose acts are false will be uprooted.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 1
text: My son, keep my teaching in your memory, and my rules in your heart:

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 2
text: For they will give you increase of days, years of life, and peace.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 3
text: Let not mercy and good faith go from you; let them be hanging round your neck, recorded on your heart;

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 4
text: So you will have grace and a good name in the eyes of God and men.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 5
text: Put all your hope in God, not looking to your reason for support.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 6
text: In all your ways give ear to him, and he will make straight your footsteps.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 7
text: Put no high value on your wisdom: let the fear of the Lord be before you, and keep yourself from evil:

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 8
text: This will give strength to your flesh, and new life to your bones.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 9
text: Give honour to the Lord with your wealth, and with the first-fruits of all your increase:

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 10
text: So your store-houses will be full of grain, and your vessels overflowing with new wine.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 11
text: My son, do not make your heart hard against the Lord's teaching; do not be made angry by his training:

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 12
text: For to those who are dear to him the Lord says sharp words, and makes the son in whom he has delight undergo pain.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 13
text: Happy is the man who makes discovery of wisdom, and he who gets knowledge.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 14
text: For trading in it is better than trading in silver, and its profit greater than bright gold.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 15
text: She is of more value than jewels, and nothing for which you may have a desire is fair in comparison with her.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 16
text: Long life is in her right hand, and in her left are wealth and honour.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 17
text: Her ways are ways of delight, and all her goings are peace.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 18
text: She is a tree of life to all who take her in their hands, and happy is everyone who keeps her.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 19
text: The Lord by wisdom put in position the bases of the earth; by reason he put the heavens in their place.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 20
text: By his knowledge the deep was parted, and dew came dropping from the skies.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 21
text: My son, keep good sense, and do not let wise purpose go from your eyes.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 22
text: So they will be life for your soul, and grace for your neck.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 23
text: Then you will go safely on your way, and your feet will have no cause for slipping.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 24
text: When you take your rest you will have no fear, and on your bed sleep will be sweet to you.

title: Proverbs Chapter 3 Verse 25
text: Have no fear of sudden danger, or of the storm which will come on evil-doers:
