text: And give them orders to say to their masters, This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: Say to your masters,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 5
text: I have made the earth, and man and beast on the face of the earth, by my great power and by my outstretched arm; and I will give it to anyone at my pleasure.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 6
text: And now I have given all these lands into the hands of Nebuchadnezzar, the king of Babylon, my servant; and I have given the beasts of the field to him for his use.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 7
text: And all the nations will be servants to him and to his son and to his son's son, till the time comes for his land to be overcome: and then a number of nations and great kings will take it for their use.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 8
text: And it will come about, that if any nation does not become a servant to this same Nebuchadnezzar, king of Babylon, and does not put its neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, then I will send punishment on that nation, says the Lord, by the sword and need of food and by disease, till I have given them into his hands.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 9
text: And you are not to give attention to your prophets or your readers of signs or your dreamers or those who see into the future or those who make use of secret arts, who say to you, You will not become servants of the king of Babylon:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 10
text: For they say false words to you, so that you may be sent away far from your land, and so that you may be forced out by me and come to destruction.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 11
text: But as for that nation which puts its neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon and becomes his servant, I will let that nation keep on in its land, farming it and living in it, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 12
text: And I said all this to Zedekiah, king of Judah, saying, Put your necks under the yoke of the king of Babylon and become his servants and his people, so that you may keep your lives.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 13
text: Why are you desiring death, you and your people, by the sword, and because food is gone, and by disease, as the Lord has said of the nation which does not become the servant of the king of Babylon?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 14
text: And you are not to give ear to the prophets who say to you, You will not become servants of the king of Babylon: for what they say is not true.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 15
text: For I have not sent them, says the Lord, but they are saying what is false in my name, so that I might send you out by force, causing destruction to come on you and on your prophets.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 16
text: And I said to the priests and to all the people, This is what the Lord has said: Give no attention to the words of your prophets who say to you, See, in a very little time now the vessels of the Lord's house will come back again from Babylon: for what they say to you is false.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 17
text: Give no attention to them; become servants of the king of Babylon and keep yourselves from death: why let this town become a waste?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 18
text: But if they are prophets, and if the word of the Lord is with them, let them now make request to the Lord of armies that the vessels which are still in the house of the Lord and in the house of the king of Judah and at Jerusalem, may not go to Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 19
text: For this is what the Lord has said about the rest of the vessels which are still in this town,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 20
text: Which Nebuchadnezzar, king of Babylon, did not take away, when he took Jeconiah, the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, a prisoner from Jerusalem to Babylon, with all the great men of Judah and Jerusalem;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 21
text: For this is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said about the rest of the vessels in the house of the Lord and in the house of the king of Judah and at Jerusalem:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 27 Verse 22
text: They will be taken away to Babylon, and there they will be till the day when I send their punishment on them, says the Lord. Then I will take them up and put them back in their place.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 1
text: And it came about in that year, when Zedekiah first became king of Judah, in the fourth year, in the fifth month, that Hananiah, the son of Azzur the prophet, who came from Gibeon, said to Jeremiah in the house of the Lord, before the priests and all the people,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 2
text: These are the words of the Lord of armies, the God of Israel: By me the yoke of the king of Babylon has been broken.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 3
text: In the space of two years I will send back into this place all the vessels of the Lord's house which Nebuchadnezzar, king of Babylon, took away from this place to Babylon:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 4
text: And I will let Jeconiah, the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, come back to this place, with all the prisoners of Judah who went to Babylon, says the Lord: for I will have the yoke of the king of Babylon broken.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 5
text: Then the prophet Jeremiah said to the prophet Hananiah, before the priests and all the people who had come into the house of the Lord,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 6
text: The prophet Jeremiah said, So be it: may the Lord do so: may the Lord give effect to the words which you have said, and let the vessels of the Lord's house, and all the people who have been taken away, come back from Babylon to this place.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 7
text: But still, give ear to this word which I am saying to you and to all the people:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 8
text: The prophets, who were before me and before you, from early times gave word to a number of countries and great kingdoms about war and destruction and disease.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 9
text: The prophet whose words are of peace, when his words come true, will be seen to be a prophet whom the Lord has sent.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 10
text: Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from the neck of the prophet Jeremiah and it was broken by his hands.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 11
text: And before all the people Hananiah said, The Lord has said, Even so will I let the yoke of the king of Babylon be broken off the necks of all the nations in the space of two years. Then the prophet Jeremiah went away.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 12
text: Then after the yoke had been broken off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah by Hananiah the prophet, the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 13
text: Go and say to Hananiah, This is what the Lord has said: Yokes of wood have been broken by you, but in their place I will make yokes of iron.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 14
text: For the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: I have put a yoke of iron on the necks of all these nations, making them servants to Nebuchadnezzar, king of Babylon; and they are to be his servants: and in addition I have given him the beasts of the field.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 15
text: Then the prophet Jeremiah said to Hananiah the prophet, Give ear, now, Hananiah; the Lord has not sent you; but you are making this people put their faith in what is false.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 16
text: For this reason the Lord has said, See, I will send you away from off the face of the earth: this year death will overtake you, because you have said words against the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 28 Verse 17
text: So death came to Hananiah the prophet the same year, in the seventh month.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 1
text: Now these are the words of the letter which Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem to the responsible men among those who had been taken away, and to the priests and the prophets and to all the rest of the people whom Nebuchadnezzar had taken away prisoners from Jerusalem to Babylon;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 2
text: (After Jeconiah the king and the queen-mother and the unsexed servants and the rulers of Judah and Jerusalem and the expert workmen and the metal-workers had gone away from Jerusalem;)

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 3
text: By the hand of Elasah, the son of Shaphan, and Gemariah, the son of Hilkiah, (whom Zedekiah, king of Judah, sent to Babylon, to Nebuchadnezzar, king of Babylon,) saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 4
text: This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said to all those whom I have taken away prisoners from Jerusalem to Babylon:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 5
text: Go on building houses and living in them, and planting gardens and using the fruit of them;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 6
text: Take wives and have sons and daughters, and take wives for your sons, and give your daughters to husbands, so that they may have sons and daughters; and be increased in number there and do not become less.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 7
text: And be working for the peace of the land to which I have had you taken away prisoners, and make prayer to the Lord for it: for in its peace you will have peace.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 8
text: For this is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: Do not let yourselves be tricked by the prophets who are among you, and the readers of signs, and give no attention to their dreams which they may have;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 9
text: For they are saying to you what is false in my name: I have not sent them, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 10
text: For this is what the Lord has said: When seventy years are ended for Babylon, I will have pity on you and give effect to my good purpose for you, causing you to come back to this place.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 11
text: For I am conscious of my thoughts about you, says the Lord, thoughts of peace and not of evil, to give you hope at the end.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 12
text: And you will go on crying to me and making prayer to me, and I will give ear to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 13
text: And you will be searching for me and I will be there, when you have gone after me with all your heart.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 14
text: I will be near you again, says the Lord, and your fate will be changed, and I will get you together from all the nations and from all the places where I had sent you away, says the Lord; and I will take you back again to the place from which I sent you away prisoners.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 15
text: For you have said, The Lord has given us prophets in Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 16
text: For this is what the Lord has said about the king who is seated on the seat of David's kingdom, and about all the people living in this town, your countrymen who have not gone out with you as prisoners;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 17
text: This is what the Lord of armies has said: See, I will send on them the sword and need of food and disease, and will make them like bad figs, which are of no use for food, they are so bad.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 18
text: I will go after them, attacking them with the sword and with need of food and with disease, and will make them a cause of fear to all the kingdoms of the earth, to be a curse and a wonder and a surprise and a name of shame among all the nations where I have sent them:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 19
text: Because they have not given ear to my words, says the Lord, when I sent to them my servants the prophets, getting up early and sending them; but you did not give ear, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 20
text: And now, give ear to the word of the Lord, all you whom I have sent away prisoners from Jerusalem to Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 21
text: This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said about Ahab, the son of Kolaiah, and about Zedekiah, the son of Maaseiah, who are saying to you what is false in my name: See, I will give them up into the hands of Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, and he will put them to death before your eyes.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 22
text: And their fate will be used as a curse by all the prisoners of Judah who are in Babylon, who will say, May the Lord make you like Zedekiah and like Ahab, who were burned in the fire by the king of Babylon;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 23
text: Because they have done shame in Israel, and have taken their neighbours' wives, and in my name have said false words, which I did not give them orders to say; and I myself am the witness, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 24
text: About Shemaiah the Nehelamite.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 25
text: Shemaiah the Nehelamite sent a letter in his name to Zephaniah, the son of Maaseiah the priest, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 26
text: The Lord has made you priest in place of Jehoiada the priest, to be an overseer in the house of the Lord for every man who is off his head and is acting as a prophet, to put such men in prison and in chains.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 27
text: So why have you made no protest against Jeremiah of Anathoth, who is acting as a prophet to you?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 28
text: For he has sent to us in Babylon saying, The time will be long: go on building houses and living in them, and planting gardens and using the fruit of them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 29
text: And Zephaniah the priest made clear to Jeremiah the prophet what was said in the letter, reading it to him.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 30
text: Then the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah the prophet, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 31
text: Send to all those who have been taken away, saying, This is what the Lord has said about Shemaiah the Nehelamite: Because Shemaiah has been acting as a prophet to you, and I did not send him, and has made you put your faith in what is false;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 29 Verse 32
text: For this cause the Lord has said, Truly I will send punishment on Shemaiah and on his seed; not a man of his family will have a place among this people, and he will not see the good which I am going to do to my people, says the Lord: because he has said words against the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 2
text: The Lord, the God of Israel, has said, Put down in a book all the words which I have said to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 3
text: For see, the days are coming, says the Lord, when I will let the fate of my people Israel and Judah be changed, says the Lord: and I will make them come back to the land which I gave to their fathers, so that they may take it for their heritage.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 4
text: And these are the words which the Lord said about Israel and about Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 5
text: This is what the Lord has said: A voice of shaking fear has come to our ears, of fear and not of peace.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 6
text: Put the question and see if it is possible for a man to have birth-pains: why do I see every man with his hands gripping his sides, as a woman does when the pains of birth are on her, and all faces are turned green?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 7
text: Ha! for that day is so great that there is no day like it: it is the time of Jacob's trouble: but he will get salvation from it.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 8
text: For it will come about on that day, says the Lord of armies, that his yoke will be broken off his neck, and his bands will be burst; and men of strange lands will no longer make use of him as their servant:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 9
text: But they will be servants to the Lord their God and to David their king, whom I will give back to them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 10
text: So have no fear, O Jacob, my servant, says the Lord; and do not be troubled, O Israel: for see, I will make you come back from far away, and your seed from the land where they are prisoners; and Jacob will come back, and will be quiet and at peace, and no one will give him cause for fear.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 11
text: For I am with you, says the Lord, to be your saviour: for I will put an end to all the nations where I have sent you wandering, but I will not put an end to you completely: though with wise purpose I will put right your errors, and will not let you go quite without punishment.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 12
text: For the Lord has said, Your disease may not be made well and your wound is bitter.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 13
text: There is no help for your wound, there is nothing to make you well.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 14
text: Your lovers have no more thought for you, they go after you no longer; for I have given you the wound of a hater, even cruel punishment;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 15
text: Why are you crying for help because of your wound? for your pain may never be taken away: because your evil-doing was so great and because your sins were increased, I have done these things to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 16
text: For this cause, all those who take you for their food will themselves become your food; and all your attackers, every one of them, will be taken prisoners; and those who send destruction on you will come to destruction; and all those who take away your goods by force will undergo the same themselves.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 17
text: For I will make you healthy again and I will make you well from your wounds, says the Lord; because they have given you the name of an outlaw, saying, It is Zion cared for by no man.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 18
text: The Lord has said, See, I am changing the fate of the tents of Jacob, and I will have pity on his houses; the town will be put up on its hill, and the great houses will be living-places again.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 19
text: And from them will go out praise and the sound of laughing: and I will make them great in number, and they will not become less; and I will give them glory, and they will not be small.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 20
text: And their children will be as they were in the old days, and the meeting of the people will have its place before me, and I will send punishment on all who are cruel to them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 21
text: And their chief will be of their number; their ruler will come from among themselves; and I will let him be present before me, so that he may come near to me: for who may have strength of heart to come near me? says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 22
text: And you will be my people, and I will be your God.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 23
text: See, the storm-wind of the Lord, even the heat of his wrath, has gone out, a rolling storm, bursting on the heads of the evil-doers.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 30 Verse 24
text: The wrath of the Lord will not be turned back till he has done, till he has put into effect, the purposes of his heart: in days to come you will have full knowledge of this.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 1
text: At that time, says the Lord, I will be the God of all the families of Israel, and they will be my people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 2
text: The Lord has said, Grace came in the waste land to a people kept safe from the sword, even to Israel on the way to his resting-place.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 3
text: From far away he saw the Lord: my love for you is an eternal love: so with mercy I have made you come with me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 4
text: I will again make new your buildings, O virgin of Israel, and you will take up your place: again you will take up your instruments of music, and go out in the dances of those who are glad.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 5
text: Again will your vine-gardens be planted on the hill of Samaria: the planters will be planting and using the fruit.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 6
text: For there will be a day when those who get in the grapes on the hills of Ephraim will be crying, Up! let us go up to Zion to the Lord our God.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 7
text: For the Lord has said, Make a glad song for Jacob and give a cry on the top of the mountains: give the news, give praise, and say, The Lord has given salvation to his people, even to the rest of Israel.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 8
text: See, I will take them from the north country, and get them from the inmost parts of the earth, and with them the blind and the feeble-footed, the woman with child and her who is in birth-pains together: a very great army, they will come back here.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 9
text: They will come with weeping, and going before them I will be their guide: guiding them by streams of water in a straight way where there is no falling: for I am a father to Israel, and Ephraim is the first of my sons.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 10
text: Give ear to the word of the Lord, O you nations, and give news of it in the sea-lands far away, and say, He who has sent Israel wandering will get him together and will keep him as a keeper does his flock.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 11
text: For the Lord has given a price for Jacob, and made him free from the hands of him who was stronger than he.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 12
text: So they will come with songs on the high places, flowing together to the good things of the Lord, to the grain and the wine and the oil, to the young ones of the flock and of the herd: their souls will be like a watered garden, and they will have no more sorrow.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 13
text: Then the virgin will have joy in the dance, and the young men and the old will be glad: for I will have their weeping turned into joy, I will give them comfort and make them glad after their sorrow.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 14
text: I will give the priests their desired fat things, and my people will have a full measure of my good things, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 15
text: So has the Lord said: In Ramah there is a sound of crying, weeping and bitter sorrow; Rachel weeping for her children; she will not be comforted for their loss.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 16
text: The Lord has said this: Keep your voice from sorrow and your eyes from weeping: for your work will be rewarded, says the Lord; and they will come back from the land of their hater.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 17
text: And there is hope for the future, says the Lord; and your children will come back to the land which is theirs.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 18
text: Certainly Ephraim's words of grief have come to my ears, You have given me training and I have undergone it like a young cow unused to the yoke: let me be turned and come back, for you are the Lord my God.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 19
text: Truly, after I had been turned, I had regret for my ways; and after I had got knowledge, I made signs of sorrow: I was put to shame, truly, I was covered with shame, because I had to undergo the shame of my early years.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 20
text: Is Ephraim my dear son? is he the child of my delight? for whenever I say things against him, I still keep him in my memory: so my heart is troubled for him; I will certainly have mercy on him, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 21
text: Put up guiding pillars, make road signs for yourself: give attention to the highway, even the way in which you went: be turned again, O virgin of Israel, be turned to these your towns.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 22
text: How long will you go on turning this way and that, O wandering daughter? for the Lord has made a new thing on the earth, a woman changed into a man.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 23
text: So the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said, Again will these words be used in the land of Judah and in its towns, when I have let their fate be changed: May the blessing of the Lord be on you, O resting-place of righteousness, O holy mountain.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 24
text: And Judah and all its towns will be living there together; the farmers and those who go about with flocks.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 25
text: For I have given new strength to the tired soul and to every sorrowing soul in full measure.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 26
text: At this, awaking from my sleep, I saw; and my sleep was sweet to me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 27
text: See, the days are coming, says the Lord, when I will have Israel and Judah planted with the seed of man and with the seed of beast.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 28
text: And it will come about that, as I have been watching over them for the purpose of uprooting and smashing down and overturning and sending destruction and causing trouble; so I will be watching over them for the purpose of building up and planting, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 29
text: In those days they will no longer say, The fathers have been tasting bitter grapes and the children's teeth are put on edge.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 30
text: But everyone will be put to death for the evil which he himself has done: whoever has taken bitter grapes will himself have his teeth put on edge.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 31
text: See, the days are coming, says the Lord, when I will make a new agreement with the people of Israel and with the people of Judah:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 32
text: Not like the agreement which I made with their fathers, on the day when I took them by the hand to be their guide out of the land of Egypt; which agreement was broken by them, and I gave them up, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 33
text: But this is the agreement which I will make with the people of Israel after those days, says the Lord; I will put my law in their inner parts, writing it in their hearts; and I will be their God, and they will be my people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 34
text: And no longer will they be teaching every man his neighbour and every man his brother, saying, Get knowledge of the Lord: for they will all have knowledge of me, from the least of them to the greatest of them, says the Lord: for they will have my forgiveness for their evil-doing, and their sin will go from my memory for ever.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 35
text: These are the words of the Lord, who has given the sun for a light by day, ordering the moon and stars for a light by night, who puts the sea in motion, causing the thunder of its waves; the Lord of armies is his name.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 36
text: If the order of these things before me is ever broken, says the Lord, then will the seed of Israel come to an end as a nation before me for ever.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 37
text: This is what the Lord has said: If the heavens on high may be measured, and the bases of the earth searched out, then I will give up the seed of Israel, because of all they have done, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 38
text: See, the days are coming, says the Lord, for the building of the Lord's town, from the tower of Hananel to the doorway of the angle.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 39
text: And the measuring-line will go out in front of it as far as the hill Gareb, going round to Goah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 31 Verse 40
text: And all the valley of the dead bodies, and all the field of death as far as the stream Kidron, up to the angle of the horses' doorway to the east, will be holy to the Lord; it will not again be uprooted or overturned for ever.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord in the tenth year of Zedekiah, king of Judah, which was the eighteenth year of Nebuchadrezzar.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 2
text: Now at that time the king of Babylon's army was round Jerusalem, shutting it in: and Jeremiah the prophet was shut up in the place of the armed watchmen, in the house of the king of Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 3
text: For Zedekiah, king of Judah, had had him shut up, saying, Why have you, as a prophet, been saying, The Lord has said, See, I will give this town into the hands of the king of Babylon, and he will take it;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 4
text: And Zedekiah, king of Judah, will not get away from the hands of the Chaldaeans, but will certainly be given up into the hands of the king of Babylon, and will have talk with him, mouth to mouth, and see him, eye to eye.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 5
text: And he will take Zedekiah away to Babylon, where he will be till I have pity on him, says the Lord: though you are fighting with the Chaldaeans, things will not go well for you?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 6
text: And Jeremiah said, The word of the Lord came to me, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 7
text: See, Hanamel, the son of Shallum, your father's brother, will come to you and say, Give the price and get for yourself my property in Anathoth: for you have the right of the nearest relation.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 8
text: So Hanamel, the son of my father's brother, came to me, as the Lord had said, to the place of the armed watchmen, and said to me, Give the price and get my property which is in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin: for you have the nearest relation's right to the heritage; so get it for yourself. Then it was clear to me that this was the word of the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 9
text: So I got for a price the property in Anathoth from Hanamel, the son of my father's brother, and gave him the money, seventeen shekels of silver;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 10
text: And I put it in writing, stamping it with my stamp, and I took witnesses and put the money into the scales.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 11
text: So I took the paper witnessing the business, one copy rolled up and stamped, and one copy open:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 12
text: And I gave the paper to Baruch, the son of Neriah, the son of Mahseiah, before the eyes of Hanamel, the son of my father's brother, and of the witnesses who had put their names to the paper, and before all the Jews who were seated in the place of the armed watchmen.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 13
text: And I gave orders to Baruch in front of them, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 14
text: This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: Take these papers, the witness of this business, the one which is rolled up and stamped, and the one which is open; and put them in a vessel of earth so that they may be kept for a long time.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 15
text: For the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said, There will again be trading in houses and fields and vine-gardens in this land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 16
text: Now after I had given the paper to Baruch, the son of Neriah, I made my prayer to the Lord, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 17
text: Ah Lord God! see, you have made the heaven and the earth by your great power and by your outstretched arm, and there is nothing you are not able to do:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 18
text: You have mercy on thousands, and send punishment for the evil-doing of the fathers on their children after them: the great, the strong God, the Lord of armies is his name:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 19
text: Great in wisdom and strong in act: whose eyes are open on all the ways of the sons of men, giving to everyone the reward of his ways and the fruit of his doings:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 20
text: You have done signs and wonders in the land of Egypt, and even to this day, in Israel and among other men; and have made a name for yourself as at this day;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 21
text: And have taken your people Israel out of the land of Egypt with signs and with wonders and with a strong hand and an outstretched arm, causing great fear;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 22
text: And have given them this land, which you gave your word to their fathers to give them, a land flowing with milk and honey;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 23
text: And they came in and took it for their heritage, but they did not give ear to your voice, and were not ruled by your law; they have done nothing of all you gave them orders to do: so you have made all this evil come on them:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 24
text: See, they have made earthworks against the town to take it; and the town is given into the hands of the Chaldaeans who are fighting against it, because of the sword and need of food and disease: and what you have said has taken place, and truly you see it.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 25
text: And you have said to me, Give the money to get yourself a property, and have the business witnessed; though the town is given into the hands of the Chaldaeans.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 26
text: And the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 27
text: See, I am the Lord, the God of all flesh: is there anything so hard that I am unable to do it?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 28
text: So this is what the Lord has said: See, I am giving this town into the hands of the Chaldaeans and into the hands of Nebuchadrezzar, the king of Babylon, and he will take it:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 29
text: And the Chaldaeans, who are fighting against this town, will come and put the town on fire, burning it together with the houses, on the roofs of which perfumes have been burned to the Baal, and drink offerings have been drained out to other gods, moving me to wrath.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 30
text: For the children of Israel and the children of Judah have done nothing but evil in my eyes from their earliest years: the children of Israel have only made me angry with the work of their hands, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 31
text: For this town has been to me a cause of wrath and of burning passion from the day of its building till this day, so that I put it away from before my face:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 32
text: Because of all the evil of the children of Israel and of the children of Judah, which they have done to make me angry, they and their kings, their princes, their priests, and their prophets, and the men of Judah and the people of Jerusalem.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 33
text: And they have been turning their backs and not their faces to me: and though I was their teacher, getting up early and teaching them, their ears were not open to teaching.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 34
text: But they put their disgusting images into the house which is named by my name, making it unclean.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 35
text: And they put up the high places of the Baal in the valley of the son of Hinnom, making their sons and their daughters go through the fire to Molech; which I did not give them orders to do, and it never came into my mind that they would do this disgusting thing, causing Judah to be turned out of the way.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 36
text: And now the Lord, the God of Israel, has said of this town, about which you say, It is given into the hands of the king of Babylon by the sword and by need of food and by disease:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 37
text: See, I will get them together from all the countries where I have sent them in my wrath and in the heat of my passion and in my bitter feeling; and I will let them come back into this place where they may take their rest safely.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 38
text: And they will be my people, and I will be their God:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 39
text: And I will give them one heart and one way, so that they may go on in the worship of me for ever, for their good and the good of their children after them:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 40
text: And I will make an eternal agreement with them, that I will never give them up, but ever do them good; and I will put the fear of me in their hearts, so that they will not go away from me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 41
text: And truly, I will take pleasure in doing them good, and all my heart and soul will be given to planting them in this land in good faith.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 42
text: For the Lord has said: As I have made all this great evil come on this people, so I will send on them all the good which I said about them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 43
text: And there will be trading in fields in this land of which you say, It is a waste, without man or beast; it is given into the hands of the Chaldaeans.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 32 Verse 44
text: Men will get fields for money, and put the business in writing, stamping the papers and having them witnessed, in the land of Benjamin and in the country round Jerusalem and in the towns of Judah and in the towns of the hill-country and in the towns of the lowland and in the towns of the South: for I will let their fate be changed, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 1
text: Then the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah the second time, while he was still shut up in the place of the armed watchmen, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 2
text: These are the words of the Lord, who is doing it, the Lord who is forming it, to make it certain; the Lord is his name;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 3
text: Let your cry come to me, and I will give you an answer, and let you see great things and secret things of which you had no knowledge.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 4
text: For this is what the Lord, the God of Israel, has said about the houses of this town and the houses of the kings of Judah, which have been broken down to make earthworks and ...;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 5
text: ... and to make them full of the dead bodies of men whom I have put to death in my wrath and in my passion, and because of whose evil-doing I have kept my face covered from this town.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 6
text: See, I will make it healthy and well again, I will even make them well; I will let them see peace and good faith in full measure.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 7
text: And I will let the fate of Judah and of Israel be changed, building them up as at first.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 8
text: And I will make them clean from all their sin, with which they have been sinning against me; I will have forgiveness for all their sins, with which they have been sinning against me, and with which they have done evil against me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 9
text: And this town will be to me for a name of joy, for a praise and a glory before all the nations of the earth, who, hearing of all the good which I am doing for them, will be shaking with fear because of all the good and the peace which I am doing for it.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 10
text: This is what the Lord has said: There will again be sounding in this place, of which you say, It is a waste, without man and without beast; even in the towns of Judah and in the streets of Jerusalem which are waste and unpeopled, without man and without beast,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 11
text: Happy sounds, the voice of joy, the voice of the newly-married man and the voice of the bride, the voices of those who say, Give praise to the Lord of armies, for the Lord is good, for his mercy is unchanging for ever: the voices of those who go with praise into the house of the Lord. For I will let the land come back to its first condition, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 12
text: This is what the Lord of armies has said: Again there will be in this place, which is a waste, without man and without beast, and in all its towns, a resting-place where the keepers of sheep will make their flocks take rest.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 13
text: In the towns of the hill-country, in the towns of the lowland, and in the towns of the South and in the land of Benjamin and in the country round Jerusalem and in the towns of Judah, the flocks will again go under the hand of him who is numbering them, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 14
text: See, the days are coming, says the Lord, when I will give effect to the good word which I have said about the people of Israel and the people of Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 15
text: In those days and at that time, I will let a Branch of righteousness come up for David; and he will be a judge in righteousness in the land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 16
text: In those days, Judah will have salvation and Jerusalem will be safe: and this is the name which will be given to her: The Lord is our righteousness.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 17
text: For the Lord has said, David will never be without a man to take his place on the seat of the kingdom of Israel;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 18
text: And the priests and the Levites will never be without a man to come before me, offering burned offerings and perfumes and meal offerings and offerings of beasts at all times.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 19
text: And the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 20
text: The Lord has said: If it is possible for my agreement of the day and the night to be broken, so that day and night no longer come at their fixed times,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 21
text: Then my agreement with my servant David may be broken, so that he no longer has a son to take his place on the seat of the kingdom; and my agreement with the Levites, the priests, my servants.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 22
text: As it is not possible for the army of heaven to be numbered, or the sand of the sea measured, so will I make the seed of my servant David, and the Levites my servants.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 23
text: And the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 24
text: Have you taken note of what these people have said, The two families, which the Lord took for himself, he has given up? This they say, looking down on my people as being, in their eyes, no longer a nation.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 25
text: The Lord has said, If I have not made day and night, and if the limits of heaven and earth have not been fixed by me,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 33 Verse 26
text: Then I will give up caring for the seed of Jacob and of David my servant, so that I will not take of his seed to be rulers over the seed of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob: for I will let their fate be changed and will have mercy on them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord, when Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, and all his army, and all the kingdoms of the earth which were under his rule, and all the peoples, were fighting against Jerusalem and all its towns, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 2
text: The Lord, the God of Israel, has said, Go and say to Zedekiah, king of Judah, This is what the Lord has said: See, I will give this town into the hands of the king of Babylon, and he will have it burned with fire:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 3
text: And you will not get away from him, but will certainly be taken and given up into his hands; and you will see the king of Babylon, eye to eye, and he will have talk with you, mouth to mouth, and you will go to Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 4
text: But give ear to the word of the Lord, O Zedekiah, king of Judah; this is what the Lord has said about you: Death will not come to you by the sword:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 5
text: You will come to your end in peace; and such burnings as they made for your fathers, the earlier kings before you, will be made for you; and they will be weeping for you and saying, Ah lord! for I have said the word, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 6
text: Then Jeremiah the prophet said all these things to Zedekiah, king of Judah, in Jerusalem,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 7
text: When the army of the king of Babylon was fighting against Jerusalem and against all the towns of Judah which had not been taken, against Lachish and against Azekah; for these were the last of the walled towns of Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 8
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord, after King Zedekiah had made an agreement with all the people in Jerusalem, to give news in public that servants were to be made free;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 9
text: That every man was to let his Hebrew man-servant and his Hebrew servant-girl go free; so that no one might make use of a Jew, his countryman, as a servant:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 10
text: And this was done by all the rulers and the people who had taken part in the agreement, and every one let his man-servant and his servant-girl go free, not to be used as servants any longer; they did so, and let them go.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 11
text: But later, they took back again the servants and the servant-girls whom they had let go free, and put them again under the yoke as servants and servant-girls.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 12
text: For this reason the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 13
text: The Lord, the God of Israel, has said, I made an agreement with your fathers on the day when I took them out of Egypt, out of the prison-house, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 14
text: At the end of seven years every man is to let go his countryman who is a Hebrew, who has become yours for a price and has been your servant for six years; you are to let him go free: but your fathers gave no attention and did not give ear.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 15
text: And now, turning away from evil, you had done what is right in my eyes, giving a public undertaking for every man to make his neighbour free; and you had made an agreement before me in the house which is named by my name:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 16
text: But again you have put shame on my name, and you have taken back, every one his man-servant and his servant-girl, whom you had sent away free, and you have put them under the yoke again to be your servants and servant-girls.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 17
text: And so the Lord has said, You have not given ear to me and undertaken publicly, every man to let loose his countryman and his neighbour: see, I undertake to let loose against you the sword and disease and need of food; and I will send you wandering among all the kingdoms of the earth.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 18
text: And I will give the men who have gone against my agreement and have not given effect to the words of the agreement which they made before me, when the ox was cut in two and they went between the parts of it,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 19
text: The rulers of Judah and the rulers of Jerusalem, the unsexed servants and the priests and all the people of the land who went between the parts of the ox,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 20
text: Even these I will give up into the hands of their haters and into the hands of those who have designs against their lives: and their dead bodies will become food for the birds of heaven and the beasts of the earth.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 21
text: And Zedekiah, king of Judah, and his rulers I will give into the hands of their haters and into the hands of those who have designs against their lives, and into the hands of the king of Babylon's army which has gone away from you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 34 Verse 22
text: See, I will give orders, says the Lord, and make them come back to this town; and they will make war on it and take it and have it burned with fire: and I will make the towns of Judah waste and unpeopled.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord, in the days of Jehoiakim, the son of Josiah, king of Judah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 2
text: Go into the house of the Rechabites, and have talk with them, and take them into the house of the Lord, into one of the rooms, and give them wine.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 3
text: Then I took Jaazaniah, the son of Jeremiah, the son of Habazziniah, and his brothers and all his sons and all the Rechabites;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 4
text: And I took them into the house of the Lord, into the room of the sons of Hanan, the son of Igdaliah, the man of God, which was near the rulers' room, which was over the room of Maaseiah, the son of Shallum, the keeper of the door;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 5
text: And I put before the sons of the Rechabites basins full of wine and cups, and I said to them, Take some wine.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 6
text: But they said, We will take no wine: for Jonadab, the son of Rechab our father, gave us orders, saying, You are to take no wine, you or your sons, for ever:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 7
text: And you are to make no houses, or put in seed, or get vine-gardens planted, or have any: but all your days you are to go on living in tents, so that you may have a long life in the land where you are living as in a strange country.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 8
text: And we have kept the rules of Jonadab, the son of Rechab our father, in everything which he gave us orders to do, drinking no wine all our days, we and our wives and our sons and our daughters;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 9
text: Building no houses for ourselves, having no vine-gardens or fields or seed:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 10
text: But we have been living in tents, and have done everything which Jonadab our father gave us orders to do.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 11
text: But when Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, came up into the land, we said, Come, let us go to Jerusalem, away from the army of the Chaldaeans and from the army of the Aramaeans: and so we are living in Jerusalem.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 12
text: Then the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 13
text: This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: Go and say to the men of Judah and the people of Jerusalem, Is there no hope of teaching you to give ear to my words? says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 14
text: The orders which Jonadab, the son of Rechab, gave to his sons to take no wine, are done, and to this day they take no wine, for they do the orders of their father: but I have sent my words to you, getting up early and sending them, and you have not given ear to me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 15
text: And I have sent you all my servants the prophets, getting up early and sending them, saying, Come back, now, every man from his evil way, and do better, and go not after other gods to become their servants, and you will go on living in the land which I have given to you and to your fathers: but your ears have not been open, and you have not given attention to me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 16
text: Though the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have done the orders of their father which he gave them, this people has not given ear to me:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 17
text: For this reason the Lord, the God of armies, the God of Israel, has said, See, I will send on Judah and on all the people of Jerusalem all the evil which I said I would do to them: because I sent my words to them, but they did not give ear; crying out to them, but they gave no answer.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 18
text: But to the Rechabites Jeremiah said, This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: Because you have done the orders of Jonadab your father, and have kept his rules, and done everything as he gave you orders to do it;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 35 Verse 19
text: For this reason the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said, Jonadab, the son of Rechab, will never be without a man to take his place before me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 1
text: Now it came about in the fourth year of Jehoiakim, the son of Josiah, king of Judah, that this word came to Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 2
text: Take a book and put down in it all the words I have said to you against Israel and against Judah and against all the nations, from the day when my word came to you in the days of Josiah till this day.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 3
text: It may be that the people of Judah, hearing of all the evil which it is my purpose to do to them, will be turned, every man from his evil ways; so that they may have my forgiveness for their evil-doing and their sin.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 4
text: Then Jeremiah sent for Baruch, the son of Neriah; and Baruch took down from the mouth of Jeremiah all the words of the Lord which he had said to him, writing them in a book.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 5
text: And Jeremiah gave orders to Baruch, saying, I am shut up, and am not able to go into the house of the Lord:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 6
text: So you are to go, reading there from the book, which you have taken down from my mouth, the words of the Lord, in the hearing of the people in the Lord's house, on a day when they go without food, and in the hearing of all the men of Judah who have come out from their towns.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 7
text: It may be that their prayer for grace will go up to the Lord, and that every man will be turned from his evil ways: for great is the wrath and the passion made clear by the Lord against this people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 8
text: And Baruch, the son of Neriah, did as Jeremiah the prophet gave him orders to do, reading from the book the words of the Lord in the Lord's house.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 9
text: Now it came about in the fifth year of Jehoiakim, the son of Josiah, king of Judah, in the ninth month, that it was given out publicly that all the people in Jerusalem, and all the people who came from the towns of Judah to Jerusalem, were to keep from food before the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 10
text: Then Baruch gave a public reading of the words of Jeremiah from the book, in the house of the Lord, in the room of Gemariah, the son of Shaphan the scribe, in the higher square, as one goes in by the new doorway of the Lord's house, in the hearing of all the people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 11
text: And Micaiah, the son of Gemariah, the son of Shaphan, after hearing all the words of the Lord from the book,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 12
text: Went down to the king's house, to the scribe's room: and all the rulers were seated there, Elishama the scribe and Delaiah, the son of Shemaiah, and Elnathan, the son of Achbor, and Gemariah, the son of Shaphan, and Zedekiah, the son of Hananiah, and all the rulers.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 13
text: Then Micaiah gave them an account of all the words which had come to his ears when Baruch was reading the book to the people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 14
text: So all the rulers sent Jehudi, the son of Nethaniah, the son of Shelemiah, the son of Cushi, to Baruch, saying, Take in your hand the book from which you have been reading to the people and come. So Baruch, the son of Neriah, took the book in his hand and came down to them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 15
text: Then they said to him, Be seated now, and give us a reading from it. So Baruch did so, reading it to them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 16
text: Now it came about that, after hearing all the words, they said to one another in fear, We will certainly give the king an account of all these words.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 17
text: And questioning Baruch, they said, Say now, how did you put all these words down in writing from his mouth?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 18
text: Then Baruch, answering, said, He said all these things to me by word of mouth, and I put them down with ink in the book.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 19
text: Then the rulers said to Baruch, Go and put yourself in a safe place, you and Jeremiah, and let no man have knowledge of where you are.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 20
text: Then they went into the open square to the king; but the book they put away in the room of Elishama the scribe; and they gave the king an account of all the words.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 21
text: So the king sent Jehudi to get the book, and he took it from the room of Elishama the scribe. And Jehudi gave a reading of it in the hearing of the king and all the rulers who were by the king's side.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 22
text: Now the king was seated in the winter house, and a fire was burning in the fireplace in front of him.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 23
text: And it came about that whenever Jehudi, in his reading, had got through three or four divisions, the king, cutting them with his penknife, put them into the fire, till all the book was burned up in the fire which was burning in the fireplace.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 24
text: But they had no fear and gave no signs of grief, not the king or any of his servants, after hearing all these words.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 25
text: And Elnathan and Delaiah and Gemariah had made a strong request to the king not to let the book be burned, but he would not give ear to them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 26
text: And the king gave orders to Jerahmeel, the king's son, and Seraiah, the son of Azriel, and Shelemiah, the son of Abdeel, to take Baruch the scribe and Jeremiah the prophet: but the Lord kept them safe.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 27
text: Then after the book, in which Baruch had put down the words of Jeremiah, had been burned by the king, the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 28
text: Take another book and put down in it all the words which were in the first book, which Jehoiakim, king of Judah, put into the fire.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 29
text: And about Jehoiakim, king of Judah, you are to say, This is what the Lord has said: You have put this book into the fire, saying, Why have you put in it that the king of Babylon will certainly come, causing the destruction of this land and putting an end to every man and beast in it?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 30
text: For this reason the Lord has said of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, He will have no son to take his place on the seat of David: his dead body will be put out to undergo the heat of the day and the cold of the night.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 31
text: And I will send punishment on him and on his seed and on his servants for their evil-doing; I will send on them and on the people of Jerusalem and the men of Judah, all the evil which I said against them, but they did not give ear.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 36 Verse 32
text: Then Jeremiah took another book, and gave it to Baruch the scribe, the son of Neriah, who put down in it, from the mouth of Jeremiah, all the words of the book which had been burned in the fire by Jehoiakim, king of Judah: and in addition a number of other words of the same sort.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 1
text: And Zedekiah, the son of Josiah, became king in place of Coniah, the son of Jehoiakim, whom Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, made king in the land of Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 2
text: But he and his servants and the people of the land did not give ear to the words of the Lord which he said by Jeremiah the prophet.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 3
text: And Zedekiah the king sent Jehucal, the son of Shelemiah, and Zephaniah, the son of Maaseiah the priest, to the prophet Jeremiah, saying, Make prayer now to the Lord our God for us.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 4
text: (Now Jeremiah was going about among the people, for they had not put him in prison.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 5
text: And Pharaoh's army had come out from Egypt: and the Chaldaeans, who were attacking Jerusalem, hearing news of them, went away from Jerusalem.)

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 6
text: Then the word of the Lord came to the prophet Jeremiah, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 7
text: The Lord, the God of Israel, has said: This is what you are to say to the king of Judah who sent you to get directions from me: See, Pharaoh's army, which has come out to your help, will go back to Egypt, to their land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 8
text: And the Chaldaeans will come back again and make war against this town and they will take it and put it on fire.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 9
text: The Lord has said, Have no false hopes, saying to yourselves, The Chaldaeans will go away from us: for they will not go away.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 10
text: For even if you had overcome all the army of the Chaldaeans fighting against you, and there were only wounded men among them, still they would get up, every man in his tent, and put this town on fire.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 11
text: And it came about that when the Chaldaean army outside Jerusalem had gone away for fear of Pharaoh's army,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 12
text: Jeremiah went out of Jerusalem to go into the land of Benjamin, with the purpose of taking up his heritage there among the people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 13
text: But when he was at the Benjamin door, a captain of the watch named Irijah, the son of Shelemiah, the son of Hananiah, who was stationed there, put his hand on Jeremiah the prophet, saying, You are going to give yourself up to the Chaldaeans.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 14
text: Then Jeremiah said, That is not true; I am not going to the Chaldaeans. But he would not give ear to him: so Irijah made him prisoner and took him to the rulers.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 15
text: And the rulers were angry with Jeremiah, and gave him blows and put him in prison in the house of Jonathan the scribe: for they had made that the prison.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 16
text: So Jeremiah came into the hole of the prison, under the arches, and was there for a long time.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 17
text: Then King Zedekiah sent and got him out: and the king, questioning him secretly in his house, said, Is there any word from the Lord? And Jeremiah said, There is. Then he said, You will be given up into the hands of the king of Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 18
text: Then Jeremiah said to King Zedekiah, What has been my sin against you or against your servants or against this people, that you have put me in prison?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 19
text: Where now are your prophets who said to you, The king of Babylon will not come against you and against this land?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 20
text: And now be pleased to give ear, O my lord the king; let my prayer for help come before you, and do not make me go back to the house of Jonathan the scribe, for fear that I may come to my death there.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 37 Verse 21
text: Then by the order of Zedekiah the king, Jeremiah was put into the place of the armed watchmen, and they gave him every day a cake of bread from the street of the bread-makers, till all the bread in the town was used up. So Jeremiah was kept in the place of the armed watchmen.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 1
text: Now it came to the ears of Shephatiah, the son of Mattan, and Gedaliah, the son of Pashhur, and Jucal, the son of Shelemiah, and Pashhur, the son of Malchiah, that Jeremiah had said to all the people,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 2
text: These are the words of the Lord: Whoever goes on living in this town will come to his death by the sword or through need of food or by disease: but whoever goes out to the Chaldaeans will keep his life out of the power of the attackers and be safe.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 3
text: The Lord has said, This town will certainly be given into the hands of the army of the king of Babylon, and he will take it.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 4
text: Then the rulers said to the king, Let this man be put to death, because he is putting fear into the hearts of the men of war who are still in the town, and into the hearts of the people, by saying such things to them: this man is not working for the well-being of the people, but for their damage.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 5
text: Then Zedekiah the king said, See, he is in your hands: for the king was not able to do anything against them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 6
text: So they took Jeremiah and put him into the water-hole of Malchiah, the king's son, in the place of the armed watchmen: and they let Jeremiah down with cords. And in the hole there was no water, but wet earth: and Jeremiah went down into the wet earth.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 7
text: Now it came to the ears of Ebed-melech the Ethiopian, an unsexed servant in the king's house, that they had put Jeremiah into the water-hole; the king at that time being seated in the doorway of Benjamin:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 8
text: And Ebed-melech went out from the king's house and said to the king,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 9
text: My lord the king, these men have done evil in all they have done to Jeremiah the prophet, whom they have put into the water-hole; and he will come to his death in the place where he is through need of food: for there is no more bread in the town.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 10
text: Then the king gave orders to Ebed-melech the Ethiopian, saying, Take with you three men from here and get Jeremiah out of the water-hole before death overtakes him.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 11
text: So Ebed-melech took the men with him and went into the house of the king, to the place where the clothing was kept, and got from there old clothing and bits of old cloth, and let them down by cords into the water-hole where Jeremiah was.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 12
text: And Ebed-melech the Ethiopian said to Jeremiah, Put these bits of old cloth under your arms under the cords. And Jeremiah did so.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 13
text: So pulling Jeremiah up with the cords they got him out of the water-hole: and Jeremiah was kept in the place of the armed watchmen.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 14
text: Then King Zedekiah sent for Jeremiah the prophet and took him into the rulers' doorway in the house of the Lord: and the king said to Jeremiah, I have a question to put to you; keep nothing back from me.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 15
text: Then Jeremiah said to Zedekiah, If I give you the answer to your question, will you not certainly put me to death? and if I make a suggestion to you, you will not give it a hearing.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 16
text: So King Zedekiah gave his oath to Jeremiah secretly, saying, By the living Lord, who gave us our life, I will not put you to death, or give you up to these men who are desiring to take your life.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 17
text: Then Jeremiah said to Zedekiah, These are the words of the Lord, the God of armies, the God of Israel: If you go out to the king of Babylon's captains, then you will have life, and the town will not be burned with fire, and you and your family will be kept from death:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 18
text: But if you do not go out to the king of Babylon's captains, then this town will be given into the hands of the Chaldaeans and they will put it on fire, and you will not get away from them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 19
text: And King Zedekiah said to Jeremiah, I am troubled on account of the Jews who have gone over to the Chaldaeans, for fear that they may give me up to them and they will put me to shame.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 20
text: But Jeremiah said, They will not give you up: be guided now by the word of the Lord as I have given it to you, and it will be well for you, and you will keep your life.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 21
text: But if you do not go out, this is what the Lord has made clear to me:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 22
text: See, all the rest of the women in the house of the king of Judah will be taken out to the king of Babylon's captains, and these women will say, Your nearest friends have been false to you and have got the better of you: they have made your feet go deep into the wet earth, and they are turned away back from you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 23
text: And they will take all your wives and your children out to the Chaldaeans: and you will not get away out of their hands, but will be taken by the hands of the king of Babylon: and this town will be burned with fire.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 24
text: Then Zedekiah said to Jeremiah, Let no man have knowledge of these words, and you will not be put to death.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 25
text: But if it comes to the ears of the rulers that I have been talking with you, and they come and say to you, Give us word now of what you have said to the king and what the king said to you, keeping nothing back and we will not put you to death;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 26
text: Then you are to say to them, I made my request to the king, that he would not send me back to my death in Jonathan's house.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 27
text: Then all the rulers came to Jeremiah, questioning him: and he gave them an answer in the words the king had given him orders to say. So they said nothing more to him; for the thing was not made public.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 38 Verse 28
text: So Jeremiah was kept in the place of the armed watchmen till the day when Jerusalem was taken.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 1
text: And it came about, that when Jerusalem was taken, (in the ninth year of Zedekiah, king of Judah, in the tenth month, Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, with all his army, came against Jerusalem, shutting it in on every side;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 2
text: In the eleventh year of Zedekiah, in the fourth month, on the ninth day of the month, the town was broken into:)

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 3
text: All the captains of the king of Babylon came in and took their places in the middle doorway of the town, Nergal-shar-ezer, ruler of Sin-magir, the Rabmag, and Nebushazban, the Rab-saris, and all the captains of the king of Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 4
text: And when Zedekiah, king of Judah, and all the men of war saw it, they went in flight from the town by night, by the way of the king's garden, through the doorway between the two walls: and they went out by the Arabah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 5
text: But the Chaldaean army went after them and overtook Zedekiah in the lowlands of Jericho: and they made him a prisoner and took him up to Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, to Riblah in the land of Hamath, to be judged by him.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 6
text: Then the king of Babylon put the sons of Zedekiah to death before his eyes in Riblah: and the king of Babylon put to death all the great men of Judah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 7
text: And more than this, he put out Zedekiah's eyes, and had him put in chains to take him away to Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 8
text: And the Chaldaeans put the king's house on fire, as well as the houses of the people, and had the walls of Jerusalem broken down.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 9
text: Then Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, took away to Babylon as prisoners, all the rest of the workmen who were still in the town, as well as those who had given themselves up to him, and all the rest of the people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 10
text: But Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, let the poorest of the people, who had nothing whatever, go on living in the land of Judah, and gave them vine-gardens and fields at the same time.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 11
text: Now Nebuchadrezzar, king of Babylon, gave orders about Jeremiah to Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 12
text: Take him and keep an eye on him and see that no evil comes to him; but do with him whatever he says to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 13
text: So Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, sent Nebushazban, the Rab-saris, and Nergal-shar-ezer, the Rabmag, and all the chief captains of the king of Babylon,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 14
text: And they sent and took Jeremiah out of the place of the watchmen, and gave him into the care of Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, to take him to his house: so he was living among the people.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 15
text: Now the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah while he was shut up in the place of the armed watchmen, saying,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 16
text: Go and say to Ebed-melech the Ethiopian, This is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: See, my words will come true for this town, for evil and not for good: they will come about before your eyes on that day.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 17
text: But I will keep you safe on that day, says the Lord: you will not be given into the hands of the men you are fearing.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 39 Verse 18
text: For I will certainly let you go free, and you will not be put to the sword, but your life will be given to you out of the hands of your attackers: because you have put your faith in me, says the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 1
text: The word which came to Jeremiah from the Lord, after Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, had let him go from Ramah, when he had taken him; for he had been put in chains, among all the prisoners of Jerusalem and Judah who were taken away prisoners to Babylon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 2
text: And the captain of the armed men took Jeremiah and said to him, The Lord your God gave word of the evil which was to come on this place:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 3
text: *** and the Lord has made it come, and has done as he said; because of your sin against the Lord in not giving ear to his voice; and that is why this thing has come on you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 4
text: Now see, this day I am freeing you from the chains which are on your hands. If it seems good to you to come with me to Babylon, then come, and I will keep an eye on you; but if it does not seem good to you to come with me to Babylon, then do not come: see, all the land is before you; if it seems good and right to you to go on living in the land,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 5
text: Then go back to Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, whom the king of Babylon has made ruler over the towns of Judah, and make your living-place with him among the people; or go wherever it seems right to you to go. So the captain of the armed men gave him food and some money and let him go.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 6
text: So Jeremiah went to Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, in Mizpah, and was living with him among the people who were still in the land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 7
text: Now when it came to the ears of all the captains of the forces who were in the field, and their men, that the king of Babylon had made Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, ruler in the land, and had put under his care the men and women and children, all the poorest of the land, those who had not been taken away to Babylon;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 8
text: Then they came to Gedaliah in Mizpah, even Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, and Johanan, the son of Kareah, and Seraiah, the son of Tanhumeth, and the sons of Ephai the Netophathite, and Jezaniah, the son of the Maacathite, they and their men.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 9
text: And Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, took an oath to them and their men, saying, Have no fear of the servants of the Chaldaeans: go on living in the land, and become the servants of the king of Babylon, and all will be well.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 10
text: As for me, I will be living in Mizpah as your representative before the Chaldaeans who come to us: but you are to get in your wine and summer fruits and oil and put them in your vessels, and make living-places for yourselves in the towns which you have taken.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 11
text: In the same way, when all the Jews who were in Moab and among the children of Ammon and in Edom and in all the countries, had news that the king of Babylon had let Judah keep some of its people and that he had put over them Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 12
text: Then all the Jews came back from all the places to which they had gone in flight, and came to the land of Judah, to Gedaliah, to Mizpah, and got in a great store of wine and summer fruit.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 13
text: Now Johanan, the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces which were in the field, came to Gedaliah in Mizpah,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 14
text: And said to him, Has it come to your knowledge that Baalis, the king of the children of Ammon, has sent Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, to take your life? But Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, put no faith in what they said.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 15
text: Then Johanan, the son of Kareah, said to Gedaliah in Mizpah secretly, Let me now go and put Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, to death without anyone's knowledge: why let him take your life so that all the Jews who have come together to you may be sent in flight, and the rest of the men of Judah come to an end?

title: Jeremiah Chapter 40 Verse 16
text: But Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, said to Johanan, the son of Kareah, You are not to do this: for what you say about Ishmael is false.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 1
text: Now it came about in the seventh month that Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, the son of Elishama, of the king's seed, having with him ten men, came to Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, in Mizpah; and they had a meal together in Mizpah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 2
text: Then Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, and the ten men who were with him, got up, and attacking Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the son of Shaphan, with the sword, put to death him whom the king of Babylon had made ruler over the land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 3
text: And Ishmael put to death all the Jews who were with him, even with Gedaliah, at Mizpah, and the Chaldaean men of war.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 4
text: Now on the second day after he had put Gedaliah to death, when no one had knowledge of it,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 5
text: Some people came from Shechem, from Shiloh and Samaria, eighty men, with the hair of their faces cut off and their clothing out of order, and with cuts on their bodies, and in their hands meal offerings and perfumes which they were taking to the house of the Lord.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 6
text: And Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, went out from Mizpah with the purpose of meeting them, weeping on his way: and it came about that when he was face to face with them he said, Come to Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam.
