title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 7
text: And when they came inside the town, Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, and the men who were with him, put them to death and put their bodies into a deep hole.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 8
text: But there were ten men among them who said to Ishmael, Do not put us to death, for we have secret stores, in the country, of grain and oil and honey. So he did not put them to death with their countrymen.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 9
text: Now the hole into which Ishmael had put the dead bodies of the men whom he had put to death, was the great hole which Asa the king had made for fear of Baasha, king of Israel: and Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, made it full of the bodies of those who had been put to death.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 10
text: Then Ishmael took away as prisoners all the rest of the people who were in Mizpah, the king's daughters and all the people still in Mizpah, whom Nebuzaradan, the captain of the armed men, had put under the care of Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam: Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, took them away prisoners with the purpose of going over to the children of Ammon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 11
text: But when Johanan, the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the armed forces who were with him, had news of all the evil which Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, had done,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 12
text: They took their men and went out to make war on Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, and they came face to face with him by the great waters in Gibeon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 13
text: Now when all the people who were with Ishmael saw Johanan, the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces with him, then they were glad.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 14
text: And all the people whom Ishmael had taken away prisoners from Mizpah, turning round, came back and went to Johanan, the son of Kareah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 15
text: But Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, got away from Johanan, with eight men, and went to the children of Ammon.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 16
text: Then Johanan, the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were with him, took all the rest of the people whom Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, had made prisoners, after he had put to death Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, the people from Mizpah, that is, the men of war and the women and the children and the unsexed servants, whom he had taken back with him from Gibeon:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 17
text: And they went and were living in the resting-place of Chimham, which is near Beth-lehem on the way into Egypt,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 41 Verse 18
text: Because of the Chaldaeans: for they were in fear of them because Ishmael, the son of Nethaniah, had put to death Gedaliah, the son of Ahikam, whom the king of Babylon had made ruler over the land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 1
text: Then all the captains of the forces, and Johanan, the son of Kareah, and Jezaniah, the son of Hoshaiah, and all the people from the least to the greatest, came near,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 2
text: And said to Jeremiah the prophet, Let our request come before you, and make prayer for us to the Lord your God, even for this small band of us; for we are only a small band out of what was a great number, as your eyes may see:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 3
text: That the Lord your God may make clear to us the way in which we are to go and what we are to do.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 4
text: Then Jeremiah the prophet said to them, I have given ear to you; see, I will make prayer to the Lord your God, as you have said; and it will be that, whatever the Lord may say in answer to you, I will give you word of it, keeping nothing back.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 5
text: Then they said to Jeremiah, May the Lord be a true witness against us in good faith, if we do not do everything which the Lord your God sends you to say to us.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 6
text: If it is good or if it is evil, we will be guided by the voice of the Lord our God, to whom we are sending you; so that it may be well for us when we give ear to the voice of the Lord our God.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 7
text: And it came about that after ten days the word of the Lord came to Jeremiah.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 8
text: And he sent for Johanan, the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces who were still with him, and all the people, from the least to the greatest,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 9
text: And said to them, These are the words of the Lord, the God of Israel, to whom you sent me to put your request before him:

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 10
text: If you still go on living in the land, then I will go on building you up and not pulling you down, planting you and not uprooting you: for my purpose of doing evil to you has been changed.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 11
text: Have no fear of the king of Babylon, of whom you are now in fear; have no fear of him, says the Lord: for I am with you to keep you safe and to give you salvation from his hands.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 12
text: And I will have mercy on you, so that he may have mercy on you and let you go back to your land.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 13
text: But if you say, We have no desire to go on living in this land; and do not give ear to the voice of the Lord your God,

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 14
text: Saying, No, but we will go into the land of Egypt, where we will not see war, or be hearing the sound of the horn, or be in need of food; there we will make our living-place;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 15
text: Then give ear now to the word of the Lord, O you last of Judah: the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said, If your minds are fixed on going into Egypt and stopping there;

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 16
text: Then it will come about that the sword, which is the cause of your fear, will overtake you there in the land of Egypt, and need of food, which you are fearing, will go after you there in Egypt; and there death will come to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 17
text: Such will be the fate of all the men whose minds are fixed on going into Egypt and stopping there; they will come to their end by the sword, by being short of food, and by disease: not one of them will keep his life or get away from the evil which I will send on them.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 18
text: For this is what the Lord of armies, the God of Israel, has said: As my wrath and passion have been let loose on the people of Jerusalem, so will my passion be let loose on you when you go into Egypt: and you will become an oath and a cause of wonder and a curse and a name of shame; and you will never see this place again.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 19
text: The Lord has said about you, O last of Judah, Go not into Egypt: be certain that I have given witness to you this day.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 20
text: For you have been acting with deceit in your hearts; for you sent me to the Lord your God, saying, Make prayer for us to the Lord our God, and give us word of everything he may say, and we will do it.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 21
text: And this day I have made it clear to you, and you have not given ear to the voice of the Lord your God in anything for which he has sent me to you.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 42 Verse 22
text: And now be certain that you will come to your end by the sword and by being short of food and by disease, in the place to which you are pleased to go for a living-place.

title: Jeremiah Chapter 43 Verse 1
text: And it came about that when Jeremiah had come to the end of giving all the people the words of the Lord their God, which the Lord their God had sent him to say to them, even all these words,
